S.FORM: pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan. iza araiza ita.
pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan. iza araiza ita.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。
Good day, everyone. Here we go.

S.FORM: ilhilhiwan! pashungkitaz!
ilhilhiwan! pashongkitaz!
maqitan shinshii.
maqitan shinshii.
ilhungquiza.
ilhongqoiza.
pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan. thuini shinshii apishfazaq pashtay maniun kmuza sa akaanin a Thau a lalawa.
pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan. thoini shinshii apishfazaq pashtay manion kmoza sa akaanin a Thao a lalawa.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，平安。今天老師要教大家食物的邵語怎麼說。
Hello, everyone, peace. Today, I am going to teach you how to say Shao for food.

S.FORM: mafazaq ihu shinshii a lalawa?
mafazaq iho shinshii a lalawa?
S.TRANSL: Do you understand what the teacher says?

S.FORM: shinshii, maura iaku. shduu ihu qa uqthawan malhinuna?
shinshii, maora iako. shdoo iho qa oqthawan malhinona?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我不懂。可以再說一次嗎?
I don’t understand. Can you repeat it again?

S.FORM: ani iaku tunmaza, shduu ihu piara'inin lalawa?
ani iako tonmaza, shdoo iho piara'inin lalawa?
S.TRANSL: 我聽不到，可以大聲一點嗎?
I can’t hear you, can you speak louder?

S.FORM: riqazuan uhu inai! uqtha untal iakin malhinuna mutal.
riqazoan oho inai! oqtha ontal iakin malhinona motal.
S.TRANSL: 請看這裡! 跟著我唸一遍。
Look here, please! Repeat after me.

S.FORM: mathuaw tauduu.
mathoaw taodoo.
uqthawan malhinuna. piara'inin mihu a lalawa.
oqthawan malhinona. piara'inin miho a lalawa.
S.TRANSL: Read it again. Please speak louder.

S.FORM: irarauriuquan. ata tu palhinuna.
iraraorioqoan. ata to palhinona.
pu'apawan sa patashan.
po'apawan sa patashan.
ua, shinshii.
oa, shinshii.
pu'apawan sa patatash.
po'apawan sa patatash.
shinshii, min'aura iaku kmathu patatash.
shinshii, min'aora iako kmatho patatash.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: pu'apawan sa tatitish.
po'apawan sa tatitish.
shinshii, min'aura iaku kmathu tatitish.
shinshii, min'aora iako kmatho tatitish.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my eraser.

S.FORM: shimuluan uhu tatitish mihu a shirshir a tataal lhmupish a huruy.
shimoloan oho tatitish miho a shirshir a tataal lhmopish a horoy.
S.TRANSL: 請跟旁邊同學借橡皮擦。
Please borrow erasers from your classmates.

S.FORM: shduu mihu a tatitish ya shimulikuan?
shdoo miho a tatitish ya shimolikoan?
pangqaiza malhupish ita.
pangqaiza malhopish ita.
pananaiza lhmupish, uqthwan mapariqaz ya simaq.
pananaiza lhmopish, oqthwan mapariqaz ya simaq.
S.TRANSL: 我們就上到這裡，明天再見。
Class dismissed, see you next week.

S.FORM: tima ihu?
tima iho?
Liwan iaku.
Liwan iako.
tima ihu?
tima iho?
Huqu a azazak iaku, zain Liwan.
Hoqo a azazak iako, zain Liwan.
S.TRANSL: I am Shuhut's son, and my name is Quan.

S.FORM: tima ihu?
tima iho?
iaku sa Qaba wa lhupilhupishan a azazak, zain Liwan.
iako sa Qaba wa lhopilhopishan a azazak, zain Liwan.
S.TRANSL: I am a student in Shuhut, my name is Quan.

S.FORM: kuzan mihu a lhanaz?
kozan miho a lhanaz?
naak a lhanaz zain Liwan.
naak a lhanaz zain Liwan.
kuzan mihu a ama wa lhanaz?
kozan miho a ama wa lhanaz?
naak a ama wa lhanaz zain Huqu.
naak a ama wa lhanaz zain Hoqo.
tima thithu?
tima thitho?
Shulay thithu
Sholay thitho
naak a tantuqash ayuzi a minlhafut thithu, zain Shulay.
naak a tantoqash ayozi a minlhafot thitho, zain Sholay.
S.TRANSL: He's my brother, his name is Taniwu.

S.FORM: kuzan thithu a lhanaz?
kozan thitho a lhanaz?
thithu a lhanaz zain Shulay.
thitho a lhanaz zain Sholay.
thithu a lhanaz zain Huqu qa?
thitho a lhanaz zain Hoqo qa?
ua, thithu a lhanaz zain Huqu.
oa, thitho a lhanaz zain Hoqo.
thithu a lhanaz zain Qaba qa?
thitho a lhanaz zain Qaba qa?
ani, thithu a lhanaz zain Shulay.
ani, thitho a lhanaz zain Sholay.
tima huya wa thau?
tima hoya wa thao?
Apin thithu. naak a pan'inaan thithu.
Apin thitho. naak a pan'inaan thitho.
tima huya wa thau?
tima hoya wa thao?
naak a huruy thithu, thithu a lhanaz zain Ishuz.
naak a horoy thitho, thitho a lhanaz zain Ishoz.
S.TRANSL: 她是我的朋友，她的名字是Ishuz。
She is my friend, her name is Ishuz.

S.FORM: pizaiza s mihu a qamishan thuini?
pizaiza s miho a qamishan thoini?
iaku thuini a kawash makthin a qamishan.
iako thoini a kawash makthin a qamishan.
pizaiza s thithu a qamishan thuini?
pizaiza s thitho a qamishan thoini?
thithu thuini a kawash makthin tusha wa qamishan.
thitho thoini a kawash makthin tosha wa qamishan.
pizaiza s mihu a ama wa qamishan thuini?
pizaiza s miho a ama wa qamishan thoini?
naak a ama thuini a kawash marimaz a qamishan.
naak a ama thoini a kawash marimaz a qamishan.
lapiza s mihu a minlhafut?
lapiza s miho a minlhafot?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: itia naak a latusha tantuqash a minlhafut numa itia latata shashuazi a minlhafut.
itia naak a latosha tantoqash a minlhafot noma itia latata shashoazi a minlhafot.
S.TRANSL: 我有兩個兄姐，一個弟妹。
I have two brothers and sisters and one younger brother and sister.

S.FORM: itia mihu a tantuqash ayuzi a minlhafut?
itia miho a tantoqash ayozi a minlhafot?
ani, uka sa naak a tantuqash a ayuzi.
ani, oka sa naak a tantoqash a ayozi.
S.TRANSL: No, I don't have a brother.

S.FORM: lapiza wa thau maniun tata wa taun?
lapiza wa thao manion tata wa taon?
S.TRANSL: How many people are in your family?

S.FORM: iamin tata wa taun lashpaat a thau.
iamin tata wa taon lashpaat a thao.
S.TRANSL: There are four of us in our family.

S.FORM: intua s ihu ya malhupish?
intoa s iho ya malhopish?
itusi iaku Shtafari lhmupish.
itosi iako Shtafari lhmopish.
S.TRANSL: I study at a head society.

S.FORM: tima thithu?
tima thitho?
naak a pan'amaan thithu.
naak a pan'amaan thitho.
numa s palhkakrikriw mihu a pan'amaan?
noma s palhkakrikriw miho a pan'amaan?
S.TRANSL: 你的舅舅從事什麼工作?
What does your uncle do for a living?

S.FORM: maranash thithu.
maranash thitho.
tima s huya wa thau?
tima s hoya wa thao?
naak a tantuqash binanau'az a minlhafut thithu.
naak a tantoqash binanao'az a minlhafot thitho.
itia palhkakrikriw mihu a tantuqash binanau'az a minlhafut?
itia palhkakrikriw miho a tantoqash binanao'az a minlhafot?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister have a job?

S.FORM: itusi thithu mriqariqaz shiz a taun malhkakrikriw.
itosi thitho mriqariqaz shiz a taon malhkakrikriw.
minlhafut thaithuy qa latusha wa thau?
minlhafot thaithoy qa latosha wa thao?
S.TRANSL: 他們兩個人是兄弟姐妹嗎?

S.FORM: ani, huruy thaithuy.
ani, horoy thaithoy.
miniahala inai a thau ihu?
miniahala inai a thao iho?
ua, Thau iaku.
oa, Thao iako.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I'm from the Thao tribe.

S.FORM: miniahala inai a thau mihu a binanau'az qa?
miniahala inai a thao miho a binanao'az qa?
ua, kanuiza Bunuun thithu.
oa, kanoiza Bonoon thitho.
marutaw mihu a ama qa?
marotaw miho a ama qa?
ua, marutarutaw naak a tata wa taun a thau.
oa, marotarotaw naak a tata wa taon a thao.
S.TRANSL: Yes, we are all very tall.

S.FORM: mihu a shashuazi binanau'az a minlhafut lhmupishiza thithu qa?
miho a shashoazi binanao'az a minlhafot lhmopishiza thitho qa?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister go to school?

S.FORM: ua, lhmupishiza thithu.
oa, lhmopishiza thitho.
mafazaq malhinuna Thau a lalawa qa mihu a shashuazi a minlhafut?
mafazaq malhinona Thao a lalawa qa miho a shashoazi a minlhafot?
S.TRANSL: Do your siblings speak the language?

S.FORM: ua, mafazaq thaithuy malhinuna Thau a lalawa.
oa, mafazaq thaithoy malhinona Thao a lalawa.
S.TRANSL: Yes, they speak the ethnic language.

S.FORM: lapiza s mihu a minlhafut?
lapiza s miho a minlhafot?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: itia naak a minlhafut laturu.
itia naak a minlhafot latoro.
S.TRANSL: I have three brothers and sisters.

S.FORM: miasuun uhu mihu a ama ina qa?
miasoon oho miho a ama ina qa?
S.TRANSL: 你和爸爸媽媽一起住嗎?
Do you live with your parents?

S.FORM: ua, miasuun iaku naak a ama ina.
oa, miasoon iako naak a ama ina.
S.TRANSL: 是，我和爸爸媽媽一起住。
Yes, I live with my mom and dad.

S.FORM: miasuun uhu mihu a apura'in apuki'ay qa?
miasoon oho miho a apora'in apoki'ay qa?
S.TRANSL: 你和爺爺奶奶一起住嗎?
Do you live with your grandparents?

S.FORM: ani, ani iaku tu miasuun thaithuy.
ani, ani iako to miasoon thaithoy.
S.TRANSL: 不，我沒和跟他們一起住。
No, I didn't live with them.

S.FORM: tima s usuunan uhu?
tima s osoonan oho?
miasuun iaku naak a ama ina numa tantuqash ayuzi a minlhafut.
miasoon iako naak a ama ina noma tantoqash ayozi a minlhafot.
S.TRANSL: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥住在一起。
I live with my father, mother and brother.

S.FORM: minakanantua ihu?
minakanantoa iho?
minakatusi iaku Baraubaw makunanai.
minakatosi iako Baraobaw makonanai.
S.TRANSL: I come from the tribe of Idashor.

S.FORM: intua s maniun a taun?
intoa s manion a taon?
isai Baraubaw naam a taun.
isai Baraobaw naam a taon.
S.TRANSL: 我們的家在伊達邵部落
Our home is in the Idaho tribe.

S.FORM: intua s mihu a kataunan?
intoa s miho a kataonan?
naak a kataunan itusi Zintun.
naak a kataonan itosi Zinton.
S.TRANSL: My hometown is in Sun Moon Lake.

S.FORM: intua s maniun a kataunan?
intoa s manion a kataonan?
itusi Baraubaw naam a kataunan.
itosi Baraobaw naam a kataonan.
alhakaiza ihu mushuqish mihu a kataunan?
alhakaiza iho moshoqish miho a kataonan?
S.TRANSL: 你什麼時候會回去部落?
When are you going back to the tribe?

S.FORM: miaqay iaku mutaun ya pinangqaiza mahnariza wa qali.
miaqay iako motaon ya pinangqaiza mahnariza wa qali.
S.TRANSL: I will go back in the summer.

S.FORM: Thau a azazak iaku.
Thao a azazak iako.
maqitan thuini a qali qa?
maqitan thoini a qali qa?
mu'apawiza sa tilhaz, mathuaw mahnar sa qali.
mo'apawiza sa tilhaz, mathoaw mahnar sa qali.
S.TRANSL: The sun is coming out, it's very hot.

S.FORM: mathuaw mashimzaw isaran qa?
mathoaw mashimzaw isaran qa?
S.TRANSL: Is it going to be cold outside?

S.FORM: mathuaw mashimzaw, apashinasha sa hulus.
mathoaw mashimzaw, apashinasha sa holos.
S.TRANSL: It's cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: mathuaw mahnar isaran qa?
mathoaw mahnar isaran qa?
ani, minfariza, mathuaw mahaziwhiw.
ani, minfariza, mathoaw mahaziwhiw.
maqitan thuini a qali qa?
maqitan thoini a qali qa?
dara wa mahnar thuini a qali, mathuaw tauduu.
dara wa mahnar thoini a qali, mathoaw taodoo.
S.TRANSL: 今天不冷也不熱，很舒服。
It's neither cold nor hot today, very comfortable.

S.FORM: maqitan sa thuini a tanlhuan a qali qa?
maqitan sa thoini a tanlhoan a qali qa?
qali uka sa urum, mu'apawiza sa kilhpuz.
qali oka sa orom, mo'apawiza sa kilhpoz.
S.TRANSL: 天空沒有雲，星星出來了。
There were no clouds in the sky; the stars came out.

S.FORM: maqitan ya isaran a qali qa?
maqitan ya isaran a qali qa?
mukaktuniza qmusaz, mu'apawiza sa tilhaz numa mu'apawiza mani sa qariwazwaz.
mokaktoniza qmosaz, mo'apawiza sa tilhaz noma mo'apawiza mani sa qariwazwaz.
S.TRANSL: 雨剛剛停，出了太陽，彩虹出來了。
The rain has just stopped, the sun has come out, the rainbow is coming out.

S.FORM: miakuza maniun a qali itantu?
miakoza manion a qali itanto?
S.TRANSL: What's the weather like where you are?

S.FORM: inai iamin mathuaw mara'in a fari.
inai iamin mathoaw mara'in a fari.
S.TRANSL: We're going to have a big storm here.

S.FORM: miakuza maniun a qali itantu?
miakoza manion a qali itanto?
mathuaw maqitan, mathuaw matata wa tilhaz.
mathoaw maqitan, mathoaw matata wa tilhaz.
S.TRANSL: Very well, out of the big sun.

S.FORM: amutusi iaku malhupish.
amotosi iako malhopish.
S.TRANSL: I have to go to school.

S.FORM: qali mathuaw mashimzaw, apashinasha sa hulus.
qali mathoaw mashimzaw, apashinasha sa holos.
S.TRANSL: The weather is very cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: amusaran iaku.
amosaran iako.
a'untarawin sa qusaz ya ikahi, ata ihu tu in'aura kathu sa pashikan.
a'ontarawin sa qosaz ya ikahi, ata iho to in'aora katho sa pashikan.
S.TRANSL: 等一下會下大雨，不要忘記帶雨傘。
It's going to rain heavily, don't forget to bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: aqmusaz qa?
aqmosaz qa?
tminubarumbuniza tu ikahi, amaqusaz painan ya ikahi.
tminobaromboniza to ikahi, amaqosaz painan ya ikahi.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛打雷了，等一下可能就會下雨。
It just thundered, and it might rain later.

S.FORM: qusaziniza?
qosaziniza?
qminusaz tu ikahi, pangqaiza qusaz thuini.
qminosaz to ikahi, pangqaiza qosaz thoini.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛有下雨，現在雨停了。
It just rained, and now it's stopped.

S.FORM: qusaziniza?
qosaziniza?
qminusaz painan tu ikahi, matubu sa saran.
qminosaz painan to ikahi, matobo sa saran.
S.TRANSL: 好像下過雨了，馬路是濕的。
It seems to have rained and the road is wet.

S.FORM: qusaziniza? minu matubuiza sa mihu a buut?
qosaziniza? mino matoboiza sa miho a boot?
S.TRANSL: 在下雨嗎?你怎麼全身都濕了?
Is it raining? Why are you all wet?

S.FORM: qusazin isaran, ani iaku tu kminathu s pashikan.
qosazin isaran, ani iako to kminatho s pashikan.
S.TRANSL: 外面在下雨，我沒有帶雨傘。
It's raining outside, so I didn't bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: maqitan ihu qa?
maqitan iho qa?
mathuaw mara'in sa fari numa naak a punuq infarin mathuaw makashpar.
mathoaw mara'in sa fari noma naak a ponoq infarin mathoaw makashpar.
S.TRANSL: The wind is blowing so hard that my head hurts.

S.FORM: maqitan ihu qa?
maqitan iho qa?
mathuaw mahaha sa tilhaz numa naak a punuq patilhazin mathuaw mingqaqarimuzmuz.
mathoaw mahaha sa tilhaz noma naak a ponoq patilhazin mathoaw mingqaqarimozmoz.
S.TRANSL: 太陽好大，曬得我頭好暈。
The sun is so big, it makes me dizzy.

S.FORM: min'aura iaku kmathu sa patatash.
min'aora iako kmatho sa patatash.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: pashimul iaku ihun.
pashimol iako ihon.
min'aura iaku kmathu sa kakthi.
min'aora iako kmatho sa kakthi.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my chopsticks.

S.FORM: min'aura iaku mani kmathu sa kakthi, usha ita fariw.
min'aora iako mani kmatho sa kakthi, osha ita fariw.
S.TRANSL: 我也忘記帶筷子，我們去買。
I also forgot to bring my chopsticks, let's go buy them.

S.FORM: ushaiza ita fariw patatash?
oshaiza ita fariw patatash?
S.TRANSL: Let's go buy a pen, shall we?

S.FORM: ua, afariw iaku tatitish mani.
oa, afariw iako tatitish mani.
S.TRANSL: Well, I still have to buy erasers.

S.FORM: izau! fariw ita kunshashanu a akaanin?
izao! fariw ita konshashano a akaanin?
S.TRANSL: 來吧!我們去買早餐好嗎?
Come on! Let's go get breakfast, shall we?

S.FORM: ani, kminaaniza iaku itaun.
ani, kminaaniza iako itaon.
S.TRANSL: No, I've already eaten at home.

S.FORM: min'aura iaku pishtata sa pinuqafay.
min'aora iako pishtata sa pinoqafay.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to heat up my lunchbox.

S.FORM: uhiaw pishtata!
ohiaw pishtata!
min'aura iaku kmathu sa pinuqafay.
min'aora iako kmatho sa pinoqafay.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my lunchbox.

S.FORM: kunsuun ita kmaan sa naak a pinuqafay!
konsoon ita kmaan sa naak a pinoqafay!
S.TRANSL: 那我們一起吃我的便當吧!
Then let's eat my lunch box together!

S.FORM: numa sa akaanin uhu ya saqazi?
noma sa akaanin oho ya saqazi?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: amakaan iaku lhupilhupishan a taun a kunsaqazi a akaanin.
amakaan iako lhopilhopishan a taon a konsaqazi a akaanin.
S.TRANSL: 我要吃學校的營養午餐。
I want a nutritious school lunch.

S.FORM: numa sa akaanin uhu ya saqazi?
noma sa akaanin oho ya saqazi?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: thuini iaku kminathu sa pinuqafay, kunsuun ita saqazi kmaan.
thoini iako kminatho sa pinoqafay, konsoon ita saqazi kmaan.
S.TRANSL: 我今天有帶便當，我們中午一起吃吧!
I've brought a lunchbox today, let's eat together at noon!

S.FORM: izau! ushaiza ita matinhina sa qarimusuz?
izao! oshaiza ita matinhina sa qarimosoz?
S.TRANSL: 來吧!我們去玩籃球好嗎?
Come on! Let's go play basketball, shall we?

S.FORM: ua! paza ita.
oa! paza ita.
izau! ushaiza ita matinhina sa paru sa qarimusuz?
izao! oshaiza ita matinhina sa paro sa qarimosoz?
ani, amalhupish iaku patashan.
ani, amalhopish iako patashan.
arawan uhu sa thathapu lhai iakin.
arawan oho sa thathapo lhai iakin.
ua, haya wa thathapu lhai ihun.
oa, haya wa thathapo lhai ihon.
S.TRANSL: Okay, here's a broomstick for you.

S.FORM: arawan uhu sa tatitish lhai iakin?
arawan oho sa tatitish lhai iakin?
S.TRANSL: Can you help me with the cloth?

S.FORM: mathapu iaku bukhaz, palalawan uhu Tuba mara sa tatitish.
mathapo iako bokhaz, palalawan oho Toba mara sa tatitish.
S.TRANSL: 我在掃地，你叫Tuba幫你拿布。
I was sweeping the floor and you asked Tuba to help you with the cloth.

S.FORM: thminapuiza ihu taun a bukhaz?
thminapoiza iho taon a bokhaz?
S.TRANSL: Have you finished sweeping the floor?

S.FORM: thminapuiza iaku.
thminapoiza iako.
minu ihu qa antu mathapu sa bukhaz.
mino iho qa anto mathapo sa bokhaz.
thminapuiza iaku.
thminapoiza iako.
bukhaz antu matilaw, titishiwan uhu!
bokhaz anto matilaw, titishiwan oho!
S.TRANSL: The floor is dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: ua, amara iaku tatitish.
oa, amara iako tatitish.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll go get the cloth.

S.FORM: mathuaw maradaradaq huya wa paziwat, titishiwan uhu!
mathoaw maradaradaq hoya wa paziwat, titishiwan oho!
S.TRANSL: 那個窗戶很髒，去擦一下。
That window is very dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: italhawan, inai niwan iaku tu ukaktunin mathapu.
italhawan, inai niwan iako to okaktonin mathapo.
S.TRANSL: 等一下，我還沒掃完這裡。
Wait a minute, I'm not done sweeping here yet.

S.FORM: amuntua ihu ya ikahi?
amontoa iho ya ikahi?
amakilhim iaku sa fuifuilh patashan a shinshii.
amakilhim iako sa foifoilh patashan a shinshii.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to see my teacher.

S.FORM: amuntua ihu ya pangqaiza lhmupish?
amontoa iho ya pangqaiza lhmopish?
S.TRANSL: What do you do after school?

S.FORM: amususuun iaku naak a huruy maqaquyash.
amososoon iako naak a horoy maqaqoyash.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to sing with my friends.

S.FORM: amuntua thithu ya pangqaiza lhmupish?
amontoa thitho ya pangqaiza lhmopish?
S.TRANSL: Where does he go after school?

S.FORM: amutusi mrauz thithu.
amotosi mraoz thitho.
itia Tumi itaun?
itia Tomi itaon?
S.TRANSL: May I ask if Tumi is home?

S.FORM: ua, itaun thithu, utaunuan.
oa, itaon thitho, otaonoan.
S.TRANSL: She’s at home, please come in.

S.FORM: itia Tumi itaun?
itia Tomi itaon?
S.TRANSL: May I ask if Tumi is home? *[Lisin] Please change the name to an ethnic woman.

S.FORM: uka thithu itaun, numa sa akalawan uhu qa?
oka thitho itaon, noma sa akalawan oho qa?
S.TRANSL: 她不在，請問你有什麼事?
She's not here, what can I do for you?

S.FORM: tima?
tima?
apura'in, iaku Puni, tanaiwan sa pitaw.
apora'in, iako Poni, tanaiwan sa pitaw.
S.TRANSL: Grandpa, I'm Puni, please open the door.

S.FORM: tima?
tima?
Apin, Sihaw iaku, kilhim iaku ihun amapalhalhiqash.
Apin, Sihaw iako, kilhim iako ihon amapalhalhiqash.
S.TRANSL: Apin, I'm Sihaw, I've come to play with you. *[Kacaw][Mayaw] Please change the names of the women of each tribe.

S.FORM: mathuaw mataliza antu mriqaz.
mathoaw mataliza anto mriqaz.
ua, mathuaw iaku mangqtuqtu ihun. iahiaw mutaun mapalhinuna!
oa, mathoaw iako mangqtoqto ihon. iahiaw motaon mapalhinona!
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我很想念你。快來聊天吧!
Yeah! I miss you so much. Come on, let's chat!

S.FORM: ilhungquan, iqilhawan pushawil.
ilhongqoan, iqilhawan poshawil.
S.TRANSL: Please sit down and have some tea.

S.FORM: anuniza.
anoniza.
iqilhawan pushawil.
iqilhawan poshawil.
uau~ mathuaw maniun a pushawil makanshuz maqitan iqilhaan.
oao~ mathoaw manion a poshawil makanshoz maqitan iqilhaan.
kaanuan ita ribush a bunlhaz!
kaanoan ita ribosh a bonlhaz!
ua! haya wa ribush a bunlhaz mathuaw tauduu ya riqazan.
oa! haya wa ribosh a bonlhaz mathoaw taodoo ya riqazan.
S.TRANSL: 好喔!這些水果看起來很棒。

S.FORM: maqitan kaanin qa ribush a bunlhaz?
maqitan kaanin qa ribosh a bonlhaz?
ua, dadu mathuaw maqitan kaanin.
oa, dado mathoaw maqitan kaanin.
pinintataiza ina kuntanlhuan a pania'an iahiaw munai kmaan!
pinintataiza ina kontanlhoan a pania'an iahiaw monai kmaan!
S.TRANSL: 媽媽煮好晚餐了，快來吃吧!
Mom has cooked dinner, come and eat!

S.FORM: ua, shinawakuan naak a rima.
oa, shinawakoan naak a rima.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll go wash my hands.

S.FORM: kaanuan! ata tu kayaw! antu ihu sa shahitan.
kaanoan! ata to kayaw! anto iho sa shahitan.
S.TRANSL: 吃吧! 不要害羞! 你不是外人。
Eat! Don't be shy! You're not an outsider.

S.FORM: kunthuaw kmaan iaku, mathuaw mabuqthiwiza.
konthoaw kmaan iako, mathoaw maboqthiwiza.
S.TRANSL: I ate a lot, I'm full.

S.FORM: kaanuan! ata tu kayaw!
kaanoan! ata to kayaw!
ua, mathuaw maqitan kaanin.
oa, mathoaw maqitan kaanin.
amushaiza iaku, uqthawan mapariqaz.
amoshaiza iako, oqthawan mapariqaz.
S.TRANSL: I have to leave now, see you next time.

S.FORM: ua, uqthawan mapariqaz.
oa, oqthawan mapariqaz.
mathuaw mahumhumiza, amutauniza iaku.
mathoaw mahomhomiza, amotaoniza iako.
uqthawan munai malhalhiqash!
oqthawan monai malhalhiqash!
undaudauk mundadaan!
ondaodaok mondadaan!
ua, unaiwan ihu naak a taun kilhnaqualh ya ishawanan.
oa, onaiwan iho naak a taon kilhnaqoalh ya ishawanan.
S.TRANSL: Okay, come to my house sometime.

S.FORM: pashtay piakalingkin piakaimahan, palhintal ita thuini musui kataunan makikalhi apu numanuma.
pashtay piakalingkin piakaimahan, palhintal ita thoini mosoi kataonan makikalhi apo nomanoma.
S.TRANSL: 大家健康平安，今天我們要一起去部落訪問耆老。
Good health and peace to all, today we will go to the tribe to interview the elders.

S.FORM: ua! amashthau a lalawa iamin mat apu.
oa! amashthao a lalawa iamin mat apo.
S.TRANSL: 好喔!我們要跟耆老說邵語。

S.FORM: ashaunatantuiza ita?
ashaonatantoiza ita?
ashauna'iutuiza.
ashaona'iotoiza.
apu Kilash, itiza iamin munai mriqaz ihun.
apo Kilash, itiza iamin monai mriqaz ihon.
S.TRANSL: Grandpa Kilash, we’ve come to see you.

S.FORM: ba, mafazaq maniun mashthau! mathuaw maqitan!
ba, mafazaq manion mashthao! mathoaw maqitan!
S.TRANSL: 你們會說邵語啊!真是太棒了!
You guys speak Thau! That’s great!

S.FORM: pashtay piakalingkin piakaimahan, palhintal ita thuini musui tamakuan mubuhat.
pashtay piakalingkin piakaimahan, palhintal ita thoini mosoi tamakoan mobohat.
S.TRANSL: 大家健康平安，今天我們要一起去去菜園工作。
Be healthy and safe everyone, today we are going to work in the vegetable garden together.

S.FORM: ua, shinshii.
oa, shinshii.
pashtay uniawan ududur, ata tu in'aura kmathu sa ubuhat a aniamin.
pashtay oniawan ododor, ata to in'aora kmatho sa obohat a aniamin.
S.TRANSL: 大家過來排隊，記得帶好工具。
Come and line up, remember to bring your tools.

S.FORM: ua, shinshii, kminathu iamin az'az a ubuhat a aniamin.
oa, shinshii, kminatho iamin az'az a obohat a aniamin.
S.TRANSL: 是的，老師，我們都拿好工具了。
Yes, sir, we’ve got our tools.

S.FORM: a'itiza ita?
a'itiza ita?
niwan, ihazishuan.
niwan, ihazishoan.
S.TRANSL: Not yet, it’s still far away.

S.FORM: ushawan uhu shmansazum.
oshawan oho shmansazom.
ua, shmansazum iaku.
oa, shmansazom iako.
ushaiza ihu mara sa rumfaz a madanshir.
oshaiza iho mara sa romfaz a madanshir.
S.TRANSL: You go get the bird catcher.

S.FORM: ua, amashashaw iaku rumfaz.
oa, amashashaw iako romfaz.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I’ll go and catch the birds.

S.FORM: pashtay piakalingkin piakaimahan, amutusi ita thuini ia'ianan numanuma wa lhkaribush a luluuman.
pashtay piakalingkin piakaimahan, amotosi ita thoini ia'ianan nomanoma wa lhkaribosh a lolooman.
S.TRANSL: 大家健康平安，我們今天要去動物園。
Be healthy and safe, we are going to the zoo today.

S.FORM: mathuaw maqitan! amiakuza ita ya mutantu?
mathoaw maqitan! amiakoza ita ya motanto?
S.TRANSL: 好棒喔!我們要怎麼去呢?
Awesome! How are we going to get there?

S.FORM: milhungqu ita ba-su mutantu.
milhongqo ita ba-so motanto.
pashtay ududur, afariw ita sa qahil.
pashtay ododor, afariw ita sa qahil.
S.TRANSL: 大家排好隊，我們要買票了。
Everyone line up, we need to buy tickets now.

S.FORM: ua.
oa.
rumfaz itanamuqtha numa qlhuran itanarikus, shanamaniun mriqaz.
romfaz itanamoqtha noma qlhoran itanarikos, shanamanion mriqaz.
S.TRANSL: 前面是鳥類，後面是蛇類，大家自己參觀。
There are birds in the front and snakes in the back.

S.FORM: shinshii, shungkash iaku qlhuran.
shinshii, shongkash iako qlhoran.
ata tu shkash, ushaiza ihu riqazuan sa rumfaz.
ata to shkash, oshaiza iho riqazoan sa romfaz.
S.TRANSL: Don’t be afraid, then you go and see the birds.

S.FORM: ya tata wa tilhaz amushuqish ita muriut miasuun.
ya tata wa tilhaz amoshoqish ita moriot miasoon.
S.TRANSL: 我們一個小時後回來集合。
We’ll be back in an hour.

S.FORM: ua, anuniza shinshii.
oa, anoniza shinshii.
numa sa minriqaz ihu qa thuini?
noma sa minriqaz iho qa thoini?
minriqaz iaku sa manasha wa qlhuran numa itiawan sa manasha wa rumfaz.
minriqaz iako sa manasha wa qlhoran noma itiawan sa manasha wa romfaz.
S.TRANSL: 我看到了好多蛇，還有好多鳥。
I saw a lot of snakes and a lot of birds.

S.FORM: iahiaw, amushaiza ita.
iahiaw, amoshaiza ita.
S.TRANSL: Hurry up, we have to go.

S.FORM: italhawan iakin, mathuaw mingkashlay naak a kuskus.
italhawan iakin, mathoaw mingkashlay naak a koskos.
S.TRANSL: Wait for me, my feet are tired.

S.FORM: palhintaz ita utusiwan wazaqan mrauz?
palhintaz ita otosiwan wazaqan mraoz?
S.TRANSL: 我們一起去潭那邊游泳好嗎?
Shall we go swimming at the pool together?

S.FORM: ua! paza!
oa! paza!
mathuaw inai manasha wa thau mrauz.
mathoaw inai manasha wa thao mraoz.
S.TRANSL: There are a lot of people swimming here.

S.FORM: mathuaw maruqruq imangkathi kinai ita mrauz shduuiza.
mathoaw maroqroq imangkathi kinai ita mraoz shdooiza.
S.TRANSL: 那裡水很深，我們在這裡游泳就好。
The water is deep there, so we just swim here.

S.FORM: miakuza ihu tu makunanai?
miakoza iho to makonanai?
mundadaan iaku makunanai.
mondadaan iako makonanai.
numa wa barimbin ilhungquan uhu munai?
noma wa barimbin ilhongqoan oho monai?
S.TRANSL: What kind of car did you take?

S.FORM: milhungqu iaku sa ba-su makunanai.
milhongqo iako sa ba-so makonanai.
miakuza ihu mutusi mriqariqaz shiz a taun?
miakoza iho motosi mriqariqaz shiz a taon?
S.TRANSL: How did you get to the hospital?

S.FORM: naak a ama pumbarimbin iakin malhintal mutantu.
naak a ama pombarimbin iakin malhintal motanto.
amiakuza thithu miaqay ya amutusi lhupilhupishan a taun?
amiakoza thitho miaqay ya amotosi lhopilhopishan a taon?
S.TRANSL: How does he usually go to school?

S.FORM: milhungqu thithu mabiskaw a barimbin ya mutusi lhupilhupishan a taun.
milhongqo thitho mabiskaw a barimbin ya motosi lhopilhopishan a taon.
S.TRANSL: He took the subway to school.

S.FORM: miakuza mihu a apuki'ay ya mutusi fariw sa shanglaw?
miakoza miho a apoki'ay ya motosi fariw sa shanglaw?
S.TRANSL: How does your grandmother go to the grocery store?

S.FORM: matung'utu-bai thithu ya mutusi fariw sa shanglaw.
matong'oto-bai thitho ya motosi fariw sa shanglaw.
S.TRANSL: She went to the grocery store on a motorcycle.

S.FORM: amiakuza ihu ya mutusi Lalu?
amiakoza iho ya motosi Lalo?
S.TRANSL: How are you going to get to LaRue?

S.FORM: amunruza iaku ya mutusi Lalu.
amonroza iako ya motosi Lalo.
S.TRANSL: I'm taking a boat to LaRue.

S.FORM: amiakuza thithu ya mutusi Lit-puun?
amiakoza thitho ya motosi Lit-poon?
S.TRANSL: Why is he going to Japan?

S.FORM: milhungqu thithu sa marfazfaz a barimbin mutusi Lit-puun.
milhongqo thitho sa marfazfaz a barimbin motosi Lit-poon.
S.TRANSL: He took a plane to Japan.

S.FORM: numa wa barimbin ya ilhungquan thithu ya mutusi Kau-shiung?
noma wa barimbin ya ilhongqoan thitho ya motosi Kao-shiong?
S.TRANSL: What bus did he take to Kaohsiung?

S.FORM: milhungqu thithu sa mabiskaw maquliush a barimbin mutusi Kau-shiung.
milhongqo thitho sa mabiskaw maqoliosh a barimbin motosi Kao-shiong.
S.TRANSL: He took the THSR to Kaohsiung.

S.FORM: kazaiku thithu milhungqu sa apuy a barimbin mutusi Tai-taang?
kazaiko thitho milhongqo sa apoy a barimbin motosi Tai-taang?
S.TRANSL: Did he take a train to Taitung?

S.FORM: ua, milhungqu thithu apuy a barimbin mutusi Tai-taang
oa, milhongqo thitho apoy a barimbin motosi Tai-taang
S.TRANSL: Yes, he took a train to Taitung.

S.FORM: kazaiku thithu milhungqu sa apuy a barimbin mutusi Tai-taang?
kazaiko thitho milhongqo sa apoy a barimbin motosi Tai-taang?
S.TRANSL: Did he take a train to Taitung?

S.FORM: ani, milhungqu thithu marfazfaz a barimbin mutusi Tai-taang.
ani, milhongqo thitho marfazfaz a barimbin motosi Tai-taang.
S.TRANSL: No, he took a plane to Taitung.

S.FORM: itia qa ia'ianan milhungqu sa ba-su iqualh?
itia qa ia'ianan milhongqo sa ba-so iqoalh?
S.TRANSL: Is there a bus stop near here?

S.FORM: itia, ialunlunduz uhu munsai saran shduuiza mriqaz sa ia'ianan milhungqu sa ba-su itanamuqtha.
itia, ialonlondoz oho monsai saran shdooiza mriqaz sa ia'ianan milhongqo sa ba-so itanamoqtha.
S.TRANSL: 有，你從這條路直直地走去就可以看到公車站在前面了。
Yes, you can see the bus standing in front of you if you go straight down this road.

S.FORM: intua s ya iqualh inai a ia'ianan milhungqu sa mabiskaw a barimbin?
intoa s ya iqoalh inai a ia'ianan milhongqo sa mabiskaw a barimbin?
S.TRANSL: 離這裡最近的捷運站在哪裡?
Where is the nearest MRT station?

S.FORM: uka inai sa ia'ianan milhungqu sa mabiskaw a barimbin, muqay ihu shduu milhungqu sa shadunan a barimbin.
oka inai sa ia'ianan milhongqo sa mabiskaw a barimbin, moqay iho shdoo milhongqo sa shadonan a barimbin.
S.TRANSL: 這裡沒有捷運站，你只能坐計程車。
There is no MRT station here, you can only take a taxi.

S.FORM: alhakaiza shaunatantu lhupilhupishan a taun ya milhungqu sa ba-su?
alhakaiza shaonatanto lhopilhopishan a taon ya milhongqo sa ba-so?
S.TRANSL: 如果搭公車多久會到學校?
How long will it take to get to the school if I take the bus?

S.FORM: makthin rima wa qumbu ashaunatantu lhupilhupishan a taun.
makthin rima wa qombo ashaonatanto lhopilhopishan a taon.
alhakaiza shaunatantu Tai-tiuung ya milhungqu sa mabiskaw maquliush a barimbin?
alhakaiza shaonatanto Tai-tioong ya milhongqo sa mabiskaw maqoliosh a barimbin?
S.TRANSL: 如果搭高鐵要多久時間會到臺中?
How long will it take to get to Taichung if I take the THSR?

S.FORM: tata wa tilhaz ashaunatantu Tai-tiuung.
tata wa tilhaz ashaonatanto Tai-tioong.
S.TRANSL: I will come to Taichung in an hour.

S.FORM: amindaaq qa ya pumbarimbin amutusi U-lai?
amindaaq qa ya pombarimbin amotosi U-lai?
S.TRANSL: Is it a long drive to Ulai?

S.FORM: amintata wa tilhaz painan.
amintata wa tilhaz painan.
alhakaiza shaunatantu naak a taun ya milhungqu sa mabiskaw a barimbin?
alhakaiza shaonatanto naak a taon ya milhongqo sa mabiskaw a barimbin?
S.TRANSL: 你搭捷運來我家要多久?
How long did it take you to come to my house by subway?

S.FORM: aminpushaz a qumbu painan.
aminposhaz a qombo painan.
mafazaq ihu qa kmangqtha sa kangqthaan a barimbin?
mafazaq iho qa kmangqtha sa kangqthaan a barimbin?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to ride a bicycle?

S.FORM: mafazaq iaku kmangqtha sa kangqthaan a barimbin.
mafazaq iako kmangqtha sa kangqthaan a barimbin.
itia s mihu a utu-bai?
itia s miho a oto-bai?
itia naak a utu-bai latata.
itia naak a oto-bai latata.
itia s mihu a utu-bai?
itia s miho a oto-bai?
ani, uka naak a utu-bai.
ani, oka naak a oto-bai.
S.TRANSL: No, I don't have a motorcycle.

S.FORM: shduu makikalhi iaku ihun?
shdoo makikalhi iako ihon?
shduu, mathuaw iaku mashashduu.
shdoo, mathoaw iako mashashdoo.
shduu makikalhi iaku ihun?
shdoo makikalhi iako ihon?
ani, mafazaq iaku ladadu.
ani, mafazaq iako ladado.
S.TRANSL: Don't, I don't know much about it.

S.FORM: ishawanan uhu ya saqazi? amutantu iaku makikalhiwan ihun, shduu?
ishawanan oho ya saqazi? amotanto iako makikalhiwan ihon, shdoo?
S.TRANSL: 你下午有空嗎?我想去拜訪你可以嗎?
Are you free this afternoon? I'd like to visit you, is that okay?

S.FORM: ua, a'itaun iaku mitalha ihun.
oa, a'itaon iako mitalha ihon.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll wait for you at home.

S.FORM: ishawanan uhu ya simaq? amakikalhi iaku ihun Thau a kahiwan a lalawa.
ishawanan oho ya simaq? amakikalhi iako ihon Thao a kahiwan a lalawa.
S.TRANSL: 你明天有空嗎?我想請問你關於邵族的傳說故事。
Are you free tomorrow? I'd like to ask you about the Thao legends.

S.FORM: amutusi iaku hudun ya simaq, uka iaku itaun.
amotosi iako hodon ya simaq, oka iako itaon.
S.TRANSL: 明天我要去山上，不在家喔。
I'm going to the mountains tomorrow, so I won't be home.

S.FORM: tumaza iaku suma wa thau, mathuaw ihu mafazaq Thau a kazakazash, amakikalhi iaku ihun.
tomaza iako soma wa thao, mathoaw iho mafazaq Thao a kazakazash, amakikalhi iako ihon.
S.TRANSL: 我聽說您對邵族的傳統習俗非常了解，想要請教您一下。
I have heard that you know a lot about Thao traditions and customs and I would like to ask you a few questions.

S.FORM: antu iaku tu la mafazaq, kanuiza ashuntam iaku ihun ya mafazaq iaku.
anto iako to la mafazaq, kanoiza ashontam iako ihon ya mafazaq iako.
S.TRANSL: 我所了解的不多，但是我會盡量回答。
I don't know much about it, but I will try to answer as best I can.

S.FORM: makikalhiwan iaku ihun shduu ya pulaunin sa bahi? ya miazithu, apidazah pulin sa thau.
makikalhiwan iako ihon shdoo ya polaonin sa bahi? ya miazitho, apidazah polin sa thao.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄影嗎?這樣以後比較容易記錄。
Can I record the video? It will be easier to record in the future.

S.FORM: ua, shduu.
oa, shdoo.
pizaiza s mihu a qamishan thuini?
pizaiza s miho a qamishan thoini?
makatanathu makthin ianan makashpashpat sa naak a qamishan.
makatanatho makthin ianan makashpashpat sa naak a qamishan.
parhawayuan uhu.
parhawayoan oho.
ani, tuqatuqashiza iaku
ani, toqatoqashiza iako
minakanantua ihu?
minakanantoa iho?
minakatusi iaku Baraubaw makunanai.
minakatosi iako Baraobaw makonanai.
mihu a binanau'az mani sa Thau qa?
miho a binanao'az mani sa Thao qa?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的太太也是邵族人嗎?
Is your wife also a Thao?

S.FORM: antu, Bunuun thithu.
anto, Bonoon thitho.
numa s lalawa ya kafazaqin uhu?
noma s lalawa ya kafazaqin oho?
mafazaq iaku mashthau a lalawa numa mashshpuut a lalawa.
mafazaq iako mashthao a lalawa noma mashshpoot a lalawa.
mathuaw iaku ma'alah'a thuini shduu makikalhi ihun, palhinunawan uhu ya muribush a parshian, shduu qa?
mathoaw iako ma'alah'a thoini shdoo makikalhi ihon, palhinonawan oho ya moribosh a parshian, shdoo qa?
S.TRANSL: 今天很高興能訪問您，請您談一下，有關狩獵的禁忌好嗎?
It's a pleasure to interview you today, can you talk about the taboo of hunting?

S.FORM: ua. miaqay iaku mututusi hudun muribush tu parhawayuan.
oa. miaqay iako mototosi hodon moribosh to parhawayoan.
S.TRANSL: 好的。我年輕的時候很常上山打獵。
Yes. I used to go hunting in the mountains when I was young.

S.FORM: anuniza, pishfazaq ihu iakin thuini mathuaw maqitan.
anoniza, pishfazaq iho iakin thoini mathoaw maqitan.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝，您今天所教導的真是太棒了。
Thank you, what you taught me today was really great.

S.FORM: iaku inzai a lalawa az'az muduu, tanatuqash inkahiwan a pinalhinuna.
iako inzai a lalawa az'az modoo, tanatoqash inkahiwan a pinalhinona.
S.TRANSL: 我所説的都是千真萬確的，祖先所流傳的講述。
All that I say is true, the sayings of my ancestors.

S.FORM: pananaiza thuini a lalawa. mathuaw anuniza fuifuilh ihu iakin.
pananaiza thoini a lalawa. mathoaw anoniza foifoilh iho iakin.
S.TRANSL: 今天的訪談就到這邊。非常謝謝您的分享。
That's all for today's interview. Thank you very much for sharing with us.

S.FORM: anunin qa! amuqtha ita mapalhinuna ya kahiza.
anonin qa! amoqtha ita mapalhinona ya kahiza.
amushaiza iaku, mathuaw iaku miku tunmaza suma wa kahiwan a lalawa ya kahiza.
amoshaiza iako, mathoaw iako miko tonmaza soma wa kahiwan a lalawa ya kahiza.
S.TRANSL: 我要離開了，我期待下次聽到更多的故事。
I'm leaving now, I look forward to hearing more stories next time.

S.FORM: ua, undaudauk ya mundadaan.
oa, ondaodaok ya mondadaan.
maqitan ihu, numa s afariwin uhu?
maqitan iho, noma s afariwin oho?
S.TRANSL: Hello, what do you want to buy?

S.FORM: afariw iaku baruku latata.
afariw iako baroko latata.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy a cup.

S.FORM: maqitan ihu, numa s afariwin uhu?
maqitan iho, noma s afariwin oho?
S.TRANSL: Hello, what are you looking for?

S.FORM: afariw iaku tamuhun latata.
afariw iako tamohon latata.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy a hat.

S.FORM: afariw iaku baruku, itia maniun baruku afariwin?
afariw iako baroko, itia manion baroko afariwin?
S.TRANSL: 我要買杯子，你們有賣嗎?
I want to buy a cup, do you sell them?

S.FORM: itia, lapiza afariwin uhu?
itia, lapiza afariwin oho?
S.TRANSL: Yes, how many do you want to buy?

S.FORM: itia maniun shawiki afariwin?
itia manion shawiki afariwin?
uka, ani iamin fariwan shawiki.
oka, ani iamin fariwan shawiki.
S.TRANSL: No, we don't sell betel nut.

S.FORM: afariw iaku zashuq.
afariw iako zashoq.
lapiza afariwin uhu?
lapiza afariwin oho?
S.TRANSL: How many packs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: ananaiwan iakin turu a pinutiqu a zashuq.
ananaiwan iakin toro a pinotiqo a zashoq.
afariw iaku buna.
afariw iako bona.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: buna ulhthkizin suma sa finariw.
bona olhthkizin soma sa finariw.
S.TRANSL: All the sweet potatoes are sold out.

S.FORM: afariw iaku lhimash tusha pan.
afariw iako lhimash tosha pan.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two bottles of oil.

S.FORM: muqayza iamin latataiza.
moqayza iamin latataiza.
S.TRANSL: We only have one bottle left.

S.FORM: indahipiwak uhu fariw sa qarithuy.
indahipiwak oho fariw sa qarithoy.
S.TRANSL: You go and buy me eggs.

S.FORM: lapiza wa tingting afariwin uhu?
lapiza wa tingting afariwin oho?
S.TRANSL: How many pounds do you want to buy?

S.FORM: lapiza wa tingting a qarithuy afariwin uhu?
lapiza wa tingting a qarithoy afariwin oho?
S.TRANSL: How many pounds of eggs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: afariw iaku tusha wa tingting.
afariw iako tosha wa tingting.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two catties.

S.FORM: afariw iaku latusha finutulh a shanglaw.
afariw iako latosha finotolh a shanglaw.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two handfuls of vegetables.

S.FORM: inai muqayza tininashan laturu finutulh a shanglaw, pulhthkiz lhai ihun.
inai moqayza tininashan latoro finotolh a shanglaw, polhthkiz lhai ihon.
S.TRANSL: 這裡剩三把蔬菜，都給你啦!
There are three handfuls of vegetables left, all for you!

S.FORM: lakuza wa tuali haya pinutiqu a zashuq?
lakoza wa toali haya pinotiqo a zashoq?
S.TRANSL: How much is this bag of rice?

S.FORM: tusha shaba tata wa pinutiqu a zashuq.
tosha shaba tata wa pinotiqo a zashoq.
S.TRANSL: 200 Yuan for a packet of rice.

S.FORM: shuqulhmuzin mapushaz tata wa sui, shduuiza ya mapushaz a sui.
shoqolhmozin maposhaz tata wa soi, shdooiza ya maposhaz a soi.
anuniza.
anoniza.
makatanathu makthin rima wa sui inai.
makatanatho makthin rima wa soi inai.
amuqtha iaku fariw ladadu, mintata shaba wa sui.
amoqtha iako fariw ladado, mintata shaba wa soi.
S.TRANSL: I'll buy some more, and make up 100 yuan.

S.FORM: shuqulhmuzin larima shaba ianan makthin a sui.
shoqolhmozin larima shaba ianan makthin a soi.
larima wa shaba shduu qa?
larima wa shaba shdoo qa?
mathuaw maklis izai, shduu put'uka ladadu qa?
mathoaw maklis izai, shdoo pot'oka ladado qa?
S.TRANSL: 這個太貴了，可以算便宜一點嗎?
It's too expensive, can you make it cheaper?

S.FORM: ani, mathuaw ladaduiza dai.
ani, mathoaw ladadoiza dai.
S.TRANSL: 不行，這個已經很便宜了。
No, this is already very cheap.

S.FORM: afariw iaku haya madahun.
afariw iako haya madahon.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy this packet of cookies.

S.FORM: maturuz a sui haya madahun, suma wa aniamin afariwin uhu?
matoroz a soi haya madahon, soma wa aniamin afariwin oho?
S.TRANSL: 這餅乾30元，還需要別的東西嗎?
$30 for the cookies, anything else you need?

S.FORM: shduu mihu a tuali ya shimulikuan?
shdoo miho a toali ya shimolikoan?
shduu! lakuza wa tuali amashimul ihu?
shdoo! lakoza wa toali amashimol iho?
min'aura iaku kminathu sa tuali, shduu mihu a tuali ya shimulikuan?
min'aora iako kminatho sa toali, shdoo miho a toali ya shimolikoan?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，你的錢可以借我嗎?
I forgot to bring the money, can I borrow your money?

S.FORM: min'aura iaku mani kmathu sa tuali!
min'aora iako mani kmatho sa toali!
S.TRANSL: I don't have any money either!

S.FORM: min'aura iaku kminathu sa tuali, shduu mihu a tuali ya shimulikuan?
min'aora iako kminatho sa toali, shdoo miho a toali ya shimolikoan?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，你的錢可以借我嗎?
I forgot to bring the money, can I borrow your money?

S.FORM: ani, mihalawan ihu shminimul sa naak a tuali, niwan ihu tu rinirian.
ani, mihalawan iho shminimol sa naak a toali, niwan iho to rinirian.
S.TRANSL: 不要，上次借的錢你都還沒還我。
No, you haven't paid me back the money you borrowed last time.

S.FORM: shduu mihu a hulus ya shimulikuan?
shdoo miho a holos ya shimolikoan?
S.TRANSL: 你的衣服可以借我一下嗎?

S.FORM: ua, arahu
oa, araho
shduu iaku amashimul mihu a patashan?
shdoo iako amashimol miho a patashan?
naak a patashan shimulin sa Ilun.
naak a patashan shimolin sa Ilon.
S.TRANSL: My book was borrowed by Ilun.

S.FORM: shimulikuan mihu a kangqthaan a barimbin?
shimolikoan miho a kangqthaan a barimbin?
S.TRANSL: 請借給我你的腳踏車好嗎?
Can I borrow your bicycle, please?

S.FORM: ua, ariri iakin ya simaq.
oa, ariri iakin ya simaq.
S.TRANSL: Okay, but you have to give it back to me tomorrow.

S.FORM: qusaziniza, ani iaku tu kminathu pashikan, shduu mihu a pashikan ya shimulikuan?
qosaziniza, ani iako to kminatho pashikan, shdoo miho a pashikan ya shimolikoan?
S.TRANSL: 下雨了，我沒有帶傘，借我傘好嗎?
It's raining, I don't have an umbrella, can you lend me one?

S.FORM: muqay naak a pashikan latata, iasuun ita!
moqay naak a pashikan latata, iasoon ita!
S.TRANSL: 我只有一把傘，我們一起撐吧!
I only have an umbrella, let's stick together!

S.FORM: haya patashan shinimul ihu iakin, ariri ihun.
haya patashan shinimol iho iakin, ariri ihon.
S.TRANSL: 這是你上次借我的書，還給你。
This is the book you borrowed from me last time, I give it back to you.

S.FORM: numa wa patashan ihu ya amariqaz shduu fuilh iakin.
noma wa patashan iho ya amariqaz shdoo foilh iakin.
S.TRANSL: 還想看什麼書都可以跟我說。
You can tell me what else you want to read.

S.FORM: alhakaiza ya mriri iaku ihun sa tuali?
alhakaiza ya mriri iako ihon sa toali?
S.TRANSL: When do I have to pay you back?

S.FORM: anunin qa! ihu ya itia sa tuali ariri iakin.
anonin qa! iho ya itia sa toali ariri iakin.
S.TRANSL: 沒關係，你有錢的時候再還我。
It's okay, you can pay me back when you have the money.

S.FORM: shinimimul naak a tuali, alhakaiza apushuqishin uhu?
shinimimol naak a toali, alhakaiza aposhoqishin oho?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to pay me back?

S.FORM: apushuqishin ya simaq.
aposhoqishin ya simaq.
S.TRANSL: I'll return it to you tomorrow.

S.FORM: shinimimul naak a patashan, alhakaiza apushuqishin uhu?
shinimimol naak a patashan, alhakaiza aposhoqishin oho?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to return my book?

S.FORM: pinushuqishiza ihun patashan tilha?
pinoshoqishiza ihon patashan tilha?
S.TRANSL: 我昨天不是已經還你書了嗎?
Didn't I return your book yesterday?

S.FORM: haya patatash ti Tuba shimulin uhu?
haya patatash ti Toba shimolin oho?
S.TRANSL: Did Tuba lend you this pen?

S.FORM: ua, shinimul iaku a patatash thuini.
oa, shinimol iako a patatash thoini.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I borrowed it from him today.

S.FORM: haya patatash shinimul ihu ti Tuba qa?
haya patatash shinimol iho ti Toba qa?
S.TRANSL: Did you borrow this pen from Tuba?

S.FORM: ani, finariw naak a ina haya patatash.
ani, finariw naak a ina haya patatash.
S.TRANSL: 不是，這支筆是媽媽買的。
No, this pen was bought by my mother.

S.FORM: ukaiza sa qtilha, ushuiwan uhu Anai mashimul qtilha.
okaiza sa qtilha, oshoiwan oho Anai mashimol qtilha.
S.TRANSL: We are out of salt, let's borrow some from Anai.

S.FORM: ua, amutantu iaku shmimul qtilha.
oa, amotanto iako shmimol qtilha.
palalawa ihu Anai ariri iakin tuali.
palalawa iho Anai ariri iakin toali.
S.TRANSL: Go and ask Anai to return my money.

S.FORM: lakuza wa mihu tuali shimulin thithu?
lakoza wa miho toali shimolin thitho?
S.TRANSL: How much money did you borrow from her?

S.FORM: amuntua ihu?
amontoa iho?
amutusi iaku tamakuan malhuiza sa shanglaw.
amotosi iako tamakoan malhoiza sa shanglaw.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to plant vegetables in the garden.

S.FORM: numa s kalawan uhu?
noma s kalawan oho?
mathuaw maputhum, shmiwat iaku lhmir, ashansazumak ya ikahi.
mathoaw mapothom, shmiwat iako lhmir, ashansazomak ya ikahi.
S.TRANSL: 草太多了，我在砍草，等一下要澆水。
There's too much grass, I'm cutting it, I'll have to water it later.

S.FORM: shduu arawan uhu sa qaqlhit numa aqur munai?
shdoo arawan oho sa qaqlhit noma aqor monai?
S.TRANSL: 幫我把鐮刀和鋤頭拿來好嗎?
Will you get my scythes and hoes, please?

S.FORM: pintuan uhu qa?
pintoan oho qa?
pisai wandan a shirshir.
pisai wandan a shirshir.
S.TRANSL: Put it next to the plow rake.

S.FORM: timbuhiza ihu haya wa pruq?
timbohiza iho haya wa proq?
S.TRANSL: Did you turn over the soil?

S.FORM: timbuhiza iaku sa pruq, apalhuiza iaku ya ikahi.
timbohiza iako sa proq, apalhoiza iako ya ikahi.
S.TRANSL: 我剛翻過土，等等要播種。
I just turned over the soil, and so on to sow seeds.

S.FORM: mihu a shanglaw pinalhuiza shduuiza araran kmaan?
miho a shanglaw pinalhoiza shdooiza araran kmaan?
S.TRANSL: 你種的菜可以收成來吃了嗎?
Can you harvest and eat the vegetables you planted?

S.FORM: shduuiza inai a qamthi, numa izuhui a shamaq antu shduuiza.
shdooiza inai a qamthi, noma izohoi a shamaq anto shdooiza.
S.TRANSL: 這裡的龍葵可以收成了，那裡的昭和草就還不能收成。
We can harvest Okra here, but we can't harvest Showa grass there.

S.FORM: ba! mathuaw manasha wa buna karin uhu.
ba! mathoaw manasha wa bona karin oho.
S.TRANSL: 哇!你挖了這麼多的地瓜。
(sighs) Wow! You dug up so many gourds.

S.FORM: pisuiwan uhu sa buna thapa puil shduu?
pisoiwan oho sa bona thapa poil shdoo?
S.TRANSL: Will you help me with the barn?

S.FORM: numa sa kalawan maniun?
noma sa kalawan manion?
pututuan iamin lhalhuzu pulhalhuzu sa rusaw.
pototoan iamin lhalhozo polhalhozo sa rosaw.
S.TRANSL: We are fishing fish traps to catch fish.

S.FORM: manasha inai a rusaw?
manasha inai a rosaw?
mathuaw lhalhuzu sinapuk manasha wa rusaw.
mathoaw lhalhozo sinapok manasha wa rosaw.
S.TRANSL: 魚簍裡已經抓了很多魚。
The fish basket has been full of fish.

S.FORM: miaqay ihu pasanuman smapuk rusaw?
miaqay iho pasanoman smapok rosaw?
S.TRANSL: How do you usually catch fish?

S.FORM: miaqay iaku pasain dawaz pudawaz rusaw.
miaqay iako pasain dawaz podawaz rosaw.
S.TRANSL: I use a fish net to catch fish.

S.FORM: mafazaq ihu qa pasain futulh numa lhpazishan ya muribush?
mafazaq iho qa pasain fotolh noma lhpazishan ya moribosh?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to hunt with a bow and arrow?

S.FORM: miaqay iaku putuqris ya muribush numa ya tu suma mara iaku put.huum numa kathu atu mutusi hudun muribush.
miaqay iako potoqris ya moribosh noma ya to soma mara iako pot.hoom noma katho ato motosi hodon moribosh.
S.TRANSL: 我通常都是用陷阱抓獵物，偶爾也會拿槍帶狗狩獵。
I usually catch my prey with a trap, but occasionally I hunt with a gun and a dog.

S.FORM: sinaranan wazish haya.
sinaranan wazish haya.
S.TRANSL: This is the road the boar took.

S.FORM: minu ihu qa mafazaq?
mino iho qa mafazaq?
wazish a sapaz haya, numawan izai sinaranan sa wazish.
wazish a sapaz haya, nomawan izai sinaranan sa wazish.
S.TRANSL: 這是山豬的腳印，所以這是山豬所走的路。
These are the footprints of the boar, so this is the path the boar took.

S.FORM: iahiaw mutantu mriqaz naam a pinutuqris, maraiza painan lhkaribush.
iahiaw motanto mriqaz naam a pinotoqris, maraiza painan lhkaribosh.
S.TRANSL: 快去看我們的陷阱，好像抓到獵物了。
Go and see our trap, for it seems that we have caught our prey.

S.FORM: minu ihu qa mafazaq?
mino iho qa mafazaq?
numa sa shazkinin sa atu, iahiaw utantuan ita mriqaz.
noma sa shazkinin sa ato, iahiaw otantoan ita mriqaz.
S.TRANSL: 狗好像聞到味道了。我們快跟過去。
The dog seems to have smelled it. Let's follow them.

S.FORM: numa s kalawan uhu qa?
noma s kalawan oho qa?
S.TRANSL: 你正在製作的是什麼東西?

S.FORM: qadup haya, amara sa mashmash.
qadop haya, amara sa mashmash.
S.TRANSL: 這是石壓式陷阱，用來抓老鼠的。
This is a stone trap, used to catch rats.

S.FORM: numa s pisui ihu sa aniamin?
noma s pisoi iho sa aniamin?
S.TRANSL: 你放在那裡的是什麼東西?
What is that thing you put there?

S.FORM: tuqris huya, pasain iamin tuqris amara sa takith.
toqris hoya, pasain iamin toqris amara sa takith.
S.TRANSL: 那是套腳式繩索陷阱，我們用它來抓山羌。
It was a leg-rigged rope trap, and we used it to catch Shankiang.

S.FORM: piakalingkin maniun mulhthkiz tanatuqash, mathuaw maqitan pimbahi iamin muribush mara manasha wa lhkaribush thuini.
piakalingkin manion molhthkiz tanatoqash, mathoaw maqitan pimbahi iamin moribosh mara manasha wa lhkaribosh thoini.
S.TRANSL: 感謝祖靈賜福，今天我們有很多獵物收獲。
Thanks to the blessing of our ancestors, we had a great harvest today.

S.FORM: ua! kathu ita lhkaribush mutuan pakaan suma Baraubaw a thau.
oa! katho ita lhkaribosh motoan pakaan soma Baraobaw a thao.
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我們帶回部落好好分享吧!
Yeah! Let's take it back to the tribe and share it!

S.FORM: thuini shinshii apinfazaq pashtay maniun lhkaribush a Thau a lalawa.
thoini shinshii apinfazaq pashtay manion lhkaribosh a Thao a lalawa.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家動物的邵語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of animals in Thau language today.

S.FORM: thuini shinshii apinfazaq pashtay maniun ribush a Thau a lalawa.
thoini shinshii apinfazaq pashtay manion ribosh a Thao a lalawa.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家植物的邵語怎麼說。

S.FORM: thuini shinshii apinfazaq pashtay maniun ribush a bunlhaz a Thau a lalawa.
thoini shinshii apinfazaq pashtay manion ribosh a bonlhaz a Thao a lalawa.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家水果的邵語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of fruits in Thau language today.

S.FORM: ata tu kalhus.
ata to kalhos.
ata tu palhinuna.
ata to palhinona.
ata tu kaan kakaanin.
ata to kaan kakaanin.
pu'apaw s mihu a patashan.
po'apaw s miho a patashan.
pu'apaw s mihu a patatash.
po'apaw s miho a patatash.
pu'apaw s mihu a pinatash.
po'apaw s miho a pinatash.
puil sa patashan.
poil sa patashan.
puil sa patatash.
poil sa patatash.
puil sa kakaanin.
poil sa kakaanin.
puil sa patinhina wa aniamin.
poil sa patinhina wa aniamin.
manu s haya wa patatash?
mano s haya wa patatash?
naak.
naak.
manu s haya wa patashan?
mano s haya wa patashan?
Tuba.
Toba.
manu s haya wa tatitish?
mano s haya wa tatitish?
kaurak.
kaorak.
huya wa Tuba wa hulus qa?
hoya wa Toba wa holos qa?
ani, huya sa Shuni a hulus.
ani, hoya sa Shoni a holos.
shinshii, antu kminathu sa naak a patashan.
shinshii, anto kminatho sa naak a patashan.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, I didn’t bring my textbook.

S.FORM: musuun mriqaz masa shirshir a huruy.
mosoon mriqaz masa shirshir a horoy.
S.TRANSL: Share the book with your classmate next to you.

S.FORM: mutun naak a patatash.
moton naak a patatash.
shimuluan uhu sa suma wa shirshir a huruy.
shimoloan oho sa soma wa shirshir a horoy.
naak a tatitish makauka.
naak a tatitish makaoka.
shimulin naak a tatitish ihun.
shimolin naak a tatitish ihon.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser.

S.FORM: apangqaiza malhupish ita, undaudauk mundadaan ya mutaun.
apangqaiza malhopish ita, ondaodaok mondadaan ya motaon.
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，回家路上要小心!
It is the end of the class, be careful on your way home.

S.FORM: ua. anuniza shinshii.
oa. anoniza shinshii.
apangqaiza malhupish ita, pashtay uqthawan mapariqaz.
apangqaiza malhopish ita, pashtay oqthawan mapariqaz.
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，大家再見。
The class is over, goodbye everyone

S.FORM: uqthawan mapariqaz shinshii.
oqthawan mapariqaz shinshii.
pashtay maqitan, zain naak a lhanaz Tuba.
pashtay maqitan, zain naak a lhanaz Toba.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Tuba.

S.FORM: maqitan ihu Tuba.
maqitan iho Toba.
pashtay maqitan, zain naak a lhanaz Shulay.
pashtay maqitan, zain naak a lhanaz Sholay.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Shulay.

S.FORM: Shulay maqitan ihu.
Sholay maqitan iho.
maqitan ihu, Tuba iaku.
maqitan iho, Toba iako.
Tuba maqitan ihu, Qabus iaku.
Toba maqitan iho, Qabos iako.
maqitan ihu, Shulay iaku.
maqitan iho, Sholay iako.
Shulay maqitan ihu, Qabus iaku.
Sholay maqitan iho, Qabos iako.
tima ihu?
tima iho?
iaku sa Qabus a ina, Shuni iaku.
iako sa Qabos a ina, Shoni iako.
tima ihu?
tima iho?
iaku sa Qabus a shashuazi binanau'az a minlhafut, zain naak a lhanaz Lina.
iako sa Qabos a shashoazi binanao'az a minlhafot, zain naak a lhanaz Lina.
S.TRANSL: 我是Qabus的妹妹，我的名字是Lina。
I am Qabus’s sister. My name is Lina.

S.FORM: tima thithu?
tima thitho?
thithu naak a shinshii, zain Hudun.
thitho naak a shinshii, zain Hodon.
tima huya wa thau?
tima hoya wa thao?
thithu naak a tantuqash ayuzi a minlhafut, zain Quan.
thitho naak a tantoqash ayozi a minlhafot, zain Qoan.
Tuba thithu qa?
Toba thitho qa?
ua, Tuba thithu.
oa, Toba thitho.
Tuba ihu qa?
Toba iho qa?
ani, Qabus iaku.
ani, Qabos iako.
tima s Tuba?
tima s Toba?
iaku sa Tuba.
iako sa Toba.
tima s Qabus?
tima s Qabos?
Qabus sa naak a huruy.
Qabos sa naak a horoy.
numa sa mihu a tantuqash binanau'az a minlhafut a lhanaz?
noma sa miho a tantoqash binanao'az a minlhafot a lhanaz?

S.FORM: naak a tantuqash binanau'az a minlhafut a lhanaz zain Ali.
naak a tantoqash binanao'az a minlhafot a lhanaz zain Ali.
S.TRANSL: My elder sister’s name is Ali.

S.FORM: numa sa mihu a shashuazi binanau'az a minlhafut a lhanaz?
noma sa miho a shashoazi binanao'az a minlhafot a lhanaz?
S.TRANSL: What is your younger sister’s name?

S.FORM: naak a shashuazi binanau'az a minlhafut a lhanaz zain Lina.
naak a shashoazi binanao'az a minlhafot a lhanaz zain Lina.
S.TRANSL: My younger sister’s name is Lina.

S.FORM: mafazaq ihu thithu a lhanaz?
mafazaq iho thitho a lhanaz?
zain Tuba thithu.
zain Toba thitho.
pizaiza wa mihu a tantuqash ayuzi a minlhafut a qamishan thuini a kawash?
pizaiza wa miho a tantoqash ayozi a minlhafot a qamishan thoini a kawash?
S.TRANSL: How old is your elder brother?

S.FORM: thuini a kawash thithu makthin larima wa qamishan.
thoini a kawash thitho makthin larima wa qamishan.
pizaiza wa mihu a shashuazi ayuzi a minlhafut a qamishan thuini a kawash?
pizaiza wa miho a shashoazi ayozi a minlhafot a qamishan thoini a kawash?
S.TRANSL: How old is your younger brother?

S.FORM: thuini a kawash thithu larima wa qamishan.
thoini a kawash thitho larima wa qamishan.
maniun a kataunan ianan sa lhupilhupishan a taun?
manion a kataonan ianan sa lhopilhopishan a taon?
S.TRANSL: Do you have schools in your community?

S.FORM: ua.
oa.
lhmupish ihu qa isa kataunan a lhupilhupishan a taun?
lhmopish iho qa isa kataonan a lhopilhopishan a taon?
S.TRANSL: 你在部落的學校讀書嗎?
Do you study in your tribe’s school?

S.FORM: ua, miazai iamin sa tata wa taun a thau ya isa lhupilhupishan a taun.
oa, miazai iamin sa tata wa taon a thao ya isa lhopilhopishan a taon.
S.TRANSL: 是的，在學校讀書我們像一家人。
Yes, we are like family while we are studying at school.

S.FORM: tima s huya wa ayuzi?
tima s hoya wa ayozi?
thithu naak a pan'amaan.
thitho naak a pan'amaan.
tima s huya wa binanau'az?
tima s hoya wa binanao'az?
thithu naak a tantuqash binanau'az a minlhafut.
thitho naak a tantoqash binanao'az a minlhafot.
tima s huya wa azazak?
tima s hoya wa azazak?
thithu naak a shashuazi ayuzi a minlhafut.
thitho naak a shashoazi ayozi a minlhafot.
numa s kalawan mihu a ina wa palhkakrikriw?
noma s kalawan miho a ina wa palhkakrikriw?
