S.FORM: minkantashan thithu.
minkantashan thitho.
numa s kalawan mihu a ama wa palhkakrikriw?
noma s kalawan miho a ama wa palhkakrikriw?
S.TRANSL: 你的爸爸從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: fuifuilh patashan a shinshii thithu.
foifoilh patashan a shinshii thitho.
thithu mihu a shashuazi ayuzi a minlhafut qa?
thitho miho a shashoazi ayozi a minlhafot qa?
ani, thithu naak a shashuazi ayuzi a minlhafut a huruy.
ani, thitho naak a shashoazi ayozi a minlhafot a horoy.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我弟弟的朋友。
No, he is my younger brother’s friend.

S.FORM: thithu mihu a tantuqash binanau'az a minlhafut qa?
thitho miho a tantoqash binanao'az a minlhafot qa?
ani, thithu naak a shashuazi binanau'az a minlhafut.
ani, thitho naak a shashoazi binanao'az a minlhafot.
S.TRANSL: No, she is my younger sister.

S.FORM: lapiza wa thau thaithuy tata wa taun?
lapiza wa thao thaithoy tata wa taon?
S.TRANSL: How many people in their family?

S.FORM: itia thaithuy tata wa taun larima wa thau.
itia thaithoy tata wa taon larima wa thao.
S.TRANSL: There are five people in their family.

S.FORM: lapiza wa azazak maniun a taun?
lapiza wa azazak manion a taon?
S.TRANSL: How many children in your family?

S.FORM: iamin tata wa taun lashpaat a azazak.
iamin tata wa taon lashpaat a azazak.
S.TRANSL: There are four children in our family.

S.FORM: lapiza s mihu a shashuazi a minlhafut?
lapiza s miho a shashoazi a minlhafot?
S.TRANSL: How many younger siblings do you have?

S.FORM: uka iaku tu shashuazi ayuzi a minlhafut numa itia shashuazi binanau'az a minlhafut laturu.
oka iako to shashoazi ayozi a minlhafot noma itia shashoazi binanao'az a minlhafot latoro.
S.TRANSL: 我沒有弟弟，有三位妹妹。
I don’t have any younger brothers, but I have three younger sisters.

S.FORM: lapiza s mihu a tantuqash a minlhafut?
lapiza s miho a tantoqash a minlhafot?
S.TRANSL: How many older siblings do you have?

S.FORM: uka iaku tu tantuqash a minlhafut.
oka iako to tantoqash a minlhafot.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have any older siblings.

S.FORM: lapiza s mihu a minlhafut?
lapiza s miho a minlhafot?
S.TRANSL: How many siblings do you have?

S.FORM: uka iaku tu minlhafut.
oka iako to minlhafot.
minlhafut maniun qa?
minlhafot manion qa?
ua, naak a tantuqash ayuzi a minlhafut thithu.
oa, naak a tantoqash ayozi a minlhafot thitho.
miniahala inai a thau maniun qa?
miniahala inai a thao manion qa?
ua, miniahala inai a thau iamin.
oa, miniahala inai a thao iamin.
Thau mani thithu qa?
Thao mani thitho qa?
ua, Thau mani thithu.
oa, Thao mani thitho.
miakuza thuini a qali?
miakoza thoini a qali?
daza wa mashimzaw a qali, mathuaw amiqilha matata wa sazum.
daza wa mashimzaw a qali, mathoaw amiqilha matata wa sazom.
S.TRANSL: 天氣有點冷，要多喝熱水。
It’s a bit cold, so you need to drink more warm water.

S.FORM: miakuza thuini a qali?
miakoza thoini a qali?
daza wa mahnar a qali, mathuaw amiqilha sa sazum.
daza wa mahnar a qali, mathoaw amiqilha sa sazom.
S.TRANSL: It’s a bit hot, so you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: miakuza isa saran a qali?
miakoza isa saran a qali?
matata sa tilhaz, a'inanuru ata tu miarain patilhaz.
matata sa tilhaz, a'inanoro ata to miarain patilhaz.
S.TRANSL: The sun is bright and remember to wear sunscreen.

S.FORM: miakuza isa saran a qali?
miakoza isa saran a qali?
qalha urum numa tilhaz pakdupan urum.
qalha orom noma tilhaz pakdopan orom.
S.TRANSL: 雲很多，太陽被雲遮住了。
There are a lot of clouds but no sun in the sky.

S.FORM: miakuza simaq a qali?
miakoza simaq a qali?
uka tilhaz ya simaq, numa qalha urum numa mara'in a fari.
oka tilhaz ya simaq, noma qalha orom noma mara'in a fari.
S.TRANSL: 明天沒有太陽，雲很多，風很大。
It will be cloudy and windy but not sunny tomorrow.

S.FORM: miakuza izui a qali?
miakoza izoi a qali?
S.TRANSL: How was the weather that day?

S.FORM: izai a qali daza wa mashimzaw numa ya musaran a'infazin sa maka'apaw a hulus.
izai a qali daza wa mashimzaw noma ya mosaran a'infazin sa maka'apaw a holos.
S.TRANSL: 這天有點冷，出門要穿外套。
It was a bit cold and you needed to wear a jacket when you went outside.

S.FORM: miakuza ya pangqaiza wa qali?
miakoza ya pangqaiza wa qali?
S.TRANSL: How’s the weather on the weekend?

S.FORM: pangqaiza wa qali mathuaw maqitan numa makazaka.
pangqaiza wa qali mathoaw maqitan noma makazaka.
S.TRANSL: It will be sunny on the weekend.

S.FORM: izui a qali amaqusaz qa?
izoi a qali amaqosaz qa?
S.TRANSL: Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: antu amaqusaz, maqa izui a qali mathuaw maqitan.
anto amaqosaz, maqa izoi a qali mathoaw maqitan.
S.TRANSL: 那天天氣晴朗，不會下雨。
It will have no rain and be sunny that day.

S.FORM: izui a qali amaqusaz qa?
izoi a qali amaqosaz qa?
S.TRANSL: Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: ua, izui a qali aqmusaz painan.
oa, izoi a qali aqmosaz painan.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it will be rainy that day.

S.FORM: qusaziniza thuini qa?
qosaziniza thoini qa?
mukaktuniza qmusaz, mu'apawiza sa tilhaz.
mokaktoniza qmosaz, mo'apawiza sa tilhaz.
S.TRANSL: The rain stops and the sun comes out.

S.FORM: qusaziniza thuini qa?
qosaziniza thoini qa?
qusaziniza, antu kminathu iaku sa pashikan.
qosaziniza, anto kminatho iako sa pashikan.
S.TRANSL: It is raining and I don’t have an umbrella with me.

S.FORM: isaran qusaziniza qa?
isaran qosaziniza qa?
antu qmusaz thuini, ya saqaziza amaqusaz painan, ya musaran amakathu sa pashikan.
anto qmosaz thoini, ya saqaziza amaqosaz painan, ya mosaran amakatho sa pashikan.
S.TRANSL: 現在沒有下雨，中午過後會下雨，出門要帶傘。
It is not raining now, but it will be rainy in the afternoon, so you need to bring an umbrella when you go out.

S.FORM: ya mapishkit mashimzawiza wa qali mathuaw amashimzaw qa?
ya mapishkit mashimzawiza wa qali mathoaw amashimzaw qa?
S.TRANSL: Will it be very cold in winter next year?

S.FORM: ua, amashimzaw ya mapishkit a mashimzawiza wa qali, apashinasha sa hulus.
oa, amashimzaw ya mapishkit a mashimzawiza wa qali, apashinasha sa holos.
S.TRANSL: 是，明年冬天會很冷，要穿很多衣服。
Yes, it will be very cold in winter next year, so you need to put on extra layers.

S.FORM: thuini a kawash mahnariza wa qali mathuaw amahnar qa?
thoini a kawash mahnariza wa qali mathoaw amahnar qa?
S.TRANSL: Will it be very hot in summer this year?

S.FORM: ua, mahnariza wa qali mathuaw mahnar, mathuaw amiqilha sa sazum.
oa, mahnariza wa qali mathoaw mahnar, mathoaw amiqilha sa sazom.
S.TRANSL: 是，夏天會很熱，要多喝水。
Yes, it will be very hot and you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: kadadu'un uhu ya puhubuqiza wa qali?
kadado'on oho ya pohoboqiza wa qali?
madaduu iaku puhubuqiza wa qali, mathuaw maqalhuuz.
madadoo iako pohoboqiza wa qali, mathoaw maqalhooz.
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡春天，天氣很溫暖。
I like spring because the weather is warm.

S.FORM: kadadu'un uhu ya mahaziwhiwiza wa qali?
kadado'on oho ya mahaziwhiwiza wa qali?
ani, antu madaduu iaku mahaziwhiwiza wa qali, maqa mathuaw manasha wa shiraus.
ani, anto madadoo iako mahaziwhiwiza wa qali, maqa mathoaw manasha wa shiraos.
S.TRANSL: 我不喜歡秋天，秋天有好多颱風。
I don’t like autumn because there are lots of typhoons in autumn.

S.FORM: min'aurak kmathu sa patashan.
min'aorak kmatho sa patashan.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the textbook.

S.FORM: iaku mat ihun miasuun mriqaz.
iako mat ihon miasoon mriqaz.
S.TRANSL: I will share it with you.

S.FORM: min'aurak kmathu sa tatitish.
min'aorak kmatho sa tatitish.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the eraser.

S.FORM: shimulin iaku ihun.
shimolin iako ihon.
min'aura ihu qa kmathu sa patatash?
min'aora iho qa kmatho sa patatash?
S.TRANSL: Do you forget to bring your pen?

S.FORM: ua, shimulikuan mihu a patatash?
oa, shimolikoan miho a patatash?
S.TRANSL: Yes, can you lend me a pen?

S.FORM: numa sa akaanin uhu ya kunsaqazi?
noma sa akaanin oho ya konsaqazi?
S.TRANSL: What would you like for lunch?

S.FORM: amakaan iaku sa paang.
amakaan iako sa paang.
numa sa akaanin uhu ya kuntanlhuan?
noma sa akaanin oho ya kontanlhoan?
S.TRANSL: What would you like for dinner?

S.FORM: amakaan iaku sa afu.
amakaan iako sa afo.
numa sa kaanin uhu ya kunshashanu?
noma sa kaanin oho ya konshashano?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for breakfast?

S.FORM: kminaan iaku sa qarithuy.
kminaan iako sa qarithoy.
numa sa kaanin uhu ya kunsaqazi?
noma sa kaanin oho ya konsaqazi?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for lunch?

S.FORM: kminaan iaku ranaw a bunlhaz.
kminaan iako ranaw a bonlhaz.
mutusi ita psaq sa qarimusuz.
motosi ita psaq sa qarimosoz.
ihalawan uhu musha, kmilhim iaku ihun ya ikahi.
ihalawan oho mosha, kmilhim iako ihon ya ikahi.
S.TRANSL: 你先去，我等一下去找你。
You go first and I will catch up later.

S.FORM: mutusi ita mrauz.
motosi ita mraoz.
ua, miasuun ita mutantu.
oa, miasoon ita motanto.
mutusi ita patinhina sa qarimusuz.
motosi ita patinhina sa qarimosoz.
ani, amihala ita mutusi antuan sa patashan.
ani, amihala ita motosi antoan sa patashan.
S.TRANSL: No, we have to carry books first.

S.FORM: shininawan uhu sa nipin?
shininawan oho sa nipin?
niwan, shminaw iaku sa baruku.
niwan, shminaw iako sa baroko.
S.TRANSL: Not yet. I am doing the dishes.

S.FORM: shininawan uhu sa nipin?
shininawan oho sa nipin?
S.TRANSL: Did you rinse out your mouth?

S.FORM: shininawaniza iaku sa nipin.
shininawaniza iako sa nipin.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I rinsed out my mouth.

S.FORM: shininawan uhu sa baruku?
shininawan oho sa baroko?
shininawaniza iaku sa baruku.
shininawaniza iako sa baroko.
minu ihu qa antu shminaw sa rima?
mino iho qa anto shminaw sa rima?
S.TRANSL: Why didn’t you wash your hands?

S.FORM: amashinaw iaku ya ikahi.
amashinaw iako ya ikahi.
S.TRANSL: I will wash my hands later.

S.FORM: numa sa kalawan uhu tu ikahi?
noma sa kalawan oho to ikahi?
S.TRANSL: What were you doing just now?

S.FORM: shitusi iaku kmilhim sa fuifuilh patashan a shinshii.
shitosi iako kmilhim sa foifoilh patashan a shinshii.
S.TRANSL: I went to meet the teacher.

S.FORM: numa sa akalawan uhu ya pangqaiza wa malhupish?
noma sa akalawan oho ya pangqaiza wa malhopish?
S.TRANSL: What are you going to do after school?

S.FORM: amiazithuiza iaku mutaun.
amiazithoiza iako motaon.
numa sa akalawan thithu ya pangqaiza wa malhupish?
noma sa akalawan thitho ya pangqaiza wa malhopish?
S.TRANSL: What is she doing after school?

S.FORM: amusui thithu mimparaw.
amosoi thitho mimparaw.
S.TRANSL: She is going to go dancing.

S.FORM: Shuni, itaun uhu qa?
Shoni, itaon oho qa?
itaun iaku, iahiaw utaun.
itaon iako, iahiaw otaon.
Shuni, itaun uhu qa?
Shoni, itaon oho qa?
uka Shuni itaun! Apin iaku, numa sa akalawan uhu, ya mushuqishiza Shuni afuilh iaku thithu.
oka Shoni itaon! Apin iako, noma sa akalawan oho, ya moshoqishiza Shoni afoilh iako thitho.
S.TRANSL: Shuni不在家耶!我是Apin，有什麼事嗎? 回來我會轉告Shuni。
Shuni is not at home. I am Apin. What can I do for you? I will let him know when he comes back.

S.FORM: tima s maniun?
tima s manion?
apuki'ay, Apin mat Shuni iamin, tanaiwan uhu s pitaw.
apoki'ay, Apin mat Shoni iamin, tanaiwan oho s pitaw.
S.TRANSL: 奶奶，我們是Apin和 Shuni， 幫我們開門!
Grandma, we are Apin and Shuni, please open the door for us.

S.FORM: tima qa?
tima qa?
Hudun iaku, amakilhim iaku sa Qabus.
Hodon iako, amakilhim iako sa Qabos.
S.TRANSL: I am Hudun, I am here for Qabus.

S.FORM: apuki'ay, munaiku mriqaz ihun.
apoki'ay, monaiko mriqaz ihon.
S.TRANSL: Grandma, I am here to see you.

S.FORM: mataniza ihu antu munai, mathuaw iaku mangqtu ihun.
mataniza iho anto monai, mathoaw iako mangqto ihon.
S.TRANSL: 你好久沒來了，我好想念你。
You haven’t been here for a long time. I missed you so much.

S.FORM: Apin, munaiku makilhim ihun malhalhiqash.
Apin, monaiko makilhim ihon malhalhiqash.
S.TRANSL: Apin, I am here to play with you.

S.FORM: iahiaw mutaun mindaaq iaku mitalha ihun.
iahiaw motaon mindaaq iako mitalha ihon.
S.TRANSL: Come on in! I have been waiting for you for a long time.

S.FORM: haya sa naak a pinalhuiza wa buna, kaanuan uhu.
haya sa naak a pinalhoiza wa bona, kaanoan oho.
S.TRANSL: 這是我種的地瓜，吃吃看。
This is the sweet potato I grow. Try it!

S.FORM: haya buna mathuaw madahun.
haya bona mathoaw madahon.
S.TRANSL: The sweet potato is so sweet.

S.FORM: unaiwan! haya sa naak a pinalhuiza wa ribush a bunlhaz, kaanuan uhu.
onaiwan! haya sa naak a pinalhoiza wa ribosh a bonlhaz, kaanoan oho.
S.TRANSL: 過來!這是我種的水果，吃看看。
Come here! These are the fruits I grow. You should try it.

S.FORM: haya wa ribush a bunlhaz mathuaw madahun.
haya wa ribosh a bonlhaz mathoaw madahon.
ilhungquan! haya sa naak a pinalhuiza wa antu kumahin a tipur, kaanuan uhu!
ilhongqoan! haya sa naak a pinalhoiza wa anto komahin a tipor, kaanoan oho!
S.TRANSL: 請坐! 這是我種的有機玉米，吃看看！
Take a seat! You should try some organic corn that I grow.

S.FORM: uau! haya tipur mathuaw madahun.
oao! haya tipor mathoaw madahon.
S.TRANSL: Wow! The corn tastes so sweet.

S.FORM: amakaan uhu sa rithkuy?
amakaan oho sa rithkoy?
ani iaku tu kmaan sa rithkuy, amakaan iaku sa fizfiz.
ani iako to kmaan sa rithkoy, amakaan iako sa fizfiz.
S.TRANSL: 我不要吃橘子，我要吃香蕉。
I can’t eat oranges. I will have some bananas instead.

S.FORM: amakaan uhu sa madahun?
amakaan oho sa madahon?
ua, mathuaw iaku mikukaan.
oa, mathoaw iako mikokaan.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I like it very much.

S.FORM: amalalas iaku ribush a bunlhaz pakaan ihun.
amalalas iako ribosh a bonlhaz pakaan ihon.
S.TRANSL: Let me peel the fruit for you.

S.FORM: anuniza, haya wa ribush a bunlhaz qalha shnir.
anoniza, haya wa ribosh a bonlhaz qalha shnir.
S.TRANSL: Thank you. This fruit is so juicy.

S.FORM: amara iaku sazum miqilha ihun.
amara iako sazom miqilha ihon.
S.TRANSL: I will bring you some water.

S.FORM: anuniza.
anoniza.
ararawan kmaan, manasha pania'an iaku pinitata.
ararawan kmaan, manasha pania'an iako pinitata.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. I cooked a lot of dishes.

S.FORM: uau! dadu mathuaw makanshuz maqitan kaanin.
oao! dado mathoaw makanshoz maqitan kaanin.
S.TRANSL: 嗚! 真的很香也好吃。
Oh! It smells good and looks delicious.

S.FORM: ararawan kmaan, itiawan manasha kmintata.
ararawan kmaan, itiawan manasha kmintata.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There is a lot more.

S.FORM: matunaw iaku kmaan.
matonaw iako kmaan.
S.TRANSL: I’ll make myself at home then.

S.FORM: ararawan kmaan, itiawan manasha kmintata.
ararawan kmaan, itiawan manasha kmintata.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There are plenty here.

S.FORM: mathuaw iaku makinaan, ani iaku tu muqtha kmaan.
mathoaw iako makinaan, ani iako to moqtha kmaan.
S.TRANSL: 我吃了好多，不能再吃了。
I ate a lot and couldn’t eat any more.

S.FORM: shinshii amakathu maniun musui hudun thuini.
shinshii amakatho manion mosoi hodon thoini.
S.TRANSL: 老師今天要帶你們去山上。
I will take you to the mountains today.

S.FORM: ina mzai mathuaw manasha wa rikish.
ina mzai mathoaw manasha wa rikish.
S.TRANSL: 媽媽說山上有很多蚊子。
Mom says that there are lots of mosquitoes in the mountains.

S.FORM: shinshii amakathu maniun musui buhat thuini.
shinshii amakatho manion mosoi bohat thoini.
S.TRANSL: 老師今天要帶你們去田裡。
I will take you to the fields.

S.FORM: amutusi ita matunbu sa pruq qa?
amotosi ita matonbo sa proq qa?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to loosen the soil?

S.FORM: amuntua ita thuini?
amontoa ita thoini?
akathun sa shinshii ita musui falhaza wa shirshir.
akathon sa shinshii ita mosoi falhaza wa shirshir.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the riverside.

S.FORM: amuntua ita thuini?
amontoa ita thoini?
akathun sa shinshii ita musui hudun.
akathon sa shinshii ita mosoi hodon.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the mountains today.

S.FORM: amutusi ita falhaza wa shirshir thuini qa?
amotosi ita falhaza wa shirshir thoini qa?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to the riverside today?

S.FORM: ani, akathun shinshii ita ya musui hudun.
ani, akathon shinshii ita ya mosoi hodon.
S.TRANSL: 不是，老師要帶我們去山上。
No, our teacher is going to take us to the mountains.

S.FORM: amutusi ita hudun thuini qa?
amotosi ita hodon thoini qa?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to the mountains today?

S.FORM: ani, amutusi ita buhat.
ani, amotosi ita bohat.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我們今天要去田裡。
No, we are going to the fields.

S.FORM: shinshii, numa sa ariqazan ita ya musui falhaza wa shirshir?
shinshii, noma sa ariqazan ita ya mosoi falhaza wa shirshir?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我們到河邊要看什麼?
Teacher, what are we going to see at the riverside?

S.FORM: amutusi ita mriqaz sa tambalawan.
amotosi ita mriqaz sa tambalawan.
S.TRANSL: We are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: shinshii, numa sa ariqazan ita ya musui hudun?
shinshii, noma sa ariqazan ita ya mosoi hodon?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我們到山上要看什麼?
Teacher, what are we going to see in the mountains?

S.FORM: amutusi ita mriqaz sa kurari.
amotosi ita mriqaz sa korari.
S.TRANSL: We are going to see butterflies.

S.FORM: numa sa akalawan ita ya mutusi buhat?
noma sa akalawan ita ya motosi bohat?
S.TRANSL: What are we going to do in the fields?

S.FORM: amutusi ita buhat mriqaz mita wa pinalhuiza wa tipur, inanuru ianan kakulhum ianan fulhia!
amotosi ita bohat mriqaz mita wa pinalhoiza wa tipor, inanoro ianan kakolhom ianan folhia!
S.TRANSL: 我們要到田裡看我們種的玉米，要小心有螞蟻、蜜蜂唷!
We are going to see the corn we grow in the fields, but you need to be aware of the ants and bees.

S.FORM: shinshii amutusi ita falhaza wa shirshir mrauz qa?
shinshii amotosi ita falhaza wa shirshir mraoz qa?
S.TRANSL: 老師我們要到河邊游泳嗎?
Teacher, are we going to swim in the river?

S.FORM: ani, amutusi ita mriqaz sa tambalawan.
ani, amotosi ita mriqaz sa tambalawan.
S.TRANSL: No, we are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: shinshii amutusi ita buhat malhuiza sa shanglaw qa?
shinshii amotosi ita bohat malhoiza sa shanglaw qa?
S.TRANSL: 老師我們要到田裡種菜嗎?
Teacher, are we going to grow some vegetables in the fields?

S.FORM: amutusi ita thuini tumbuh sa pruq.
amotosi ita thoini tomboh sa proq.
S.TRANSL: We are going to loosen the soil today.

S.FORM: itantu ianan sa marfarfaz a tambalawan.
itanto ianan sa marfarfaz a tambalawan.
thuini iaku mriqaz sa maqalhtash a tambalawan.
thoini iako mriqaz sa maqalhtash a tambalawan.
S.TRANSL: 我今天才看過真正活著的蜻蜓。
Today is the first time I see real living dragonflies.

S.FORM: itantu ianan marfarfaz sa kurari.
itanto ianan marfarfaz sa korari.
uau! iaku mushnaw kurari, mathuaw lamaqitan.
oao! iako moshnaw korari, mathoaw lamaqitan.
S.TRANSL: 耶! 哇! 我喜歡蝴蝶，很漂亮。
Yeh! Wow! I love butterflies. They are very beautiful.

S.FORM: itantu ianan marfarfaz sa kurari.
itanto ianan marfarfaz sa korari.
antu kurari fulhia s izui.
anto korari folhia s izoi.
S.TRANSL: Those are not butterflies. They are bees.

S.FORM: inai mriqaz, ata tu uhazish.
inai mriqaz, ata to ohazish.
S.TRANSL: 在這裡看一看，不要到太遠的地方唷。
Come here and take a look. Don’t go too far!

S.FORM: ua, antu iamin muhazish.
oa, anto iamin mohazish.
S.TRANSL: 好，我們不會去太遠的地方。
Got it, we won’t go anywhere too far.

S.FORM: ata tu palalia, undaudauk maqa antu ataubukbuk.
ata to palalia, ondaodaok maqa anto ataobokbok.
S.TRANSL: 不要用跑的，慢慢走免得跌倒了。
Don’t run and walk slowly lest you fall down.

S.FORM: mathuaw mangqtu iaku iahiaw mriqaz.
mathoaw mangqto iako iahiaw mriqaz.
S.TRANSL: I want to see them right away.

S.FORM: miakuza ihu ya mutusi talhuqan?
miakoza iho ya motosi talhoqan?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to the block-house?

S.FORM: patungbarimbin iaku mutantu talhuqan.
patongbarimbin iako motanto talhoqan.
miakuza thithu ya mutusi mriqariqaz shiz a taun?
miakoza thitho ya motosi mriqariqaz shiz a taon?
S.TRANSL: How does he go to the hospital?

S.FORM: mundadaan thithu ya mutusi mriqariqaz shiz a taun.
mondadaan thitho ya motosi mriqariqaz shiz a taon.
miakuza ihu ya mutusi Ping-huu?
miakoza iho ya motosi Ping-hoo?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: milhungqu iaku sa marfarfaz a barimbin ya mutusi Ping-huu.
milhongqo iako sa marfarfaz a barimbin ya motosi Ping-hoo.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by plane.

S.FORM: miakuza ihu ya mutusi Ping-huu?
miakoza iho ya motosi Ping-hoo?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: munruza iaku ya mutusi Ping-huu.
monroza iako ya motosi Ping-hoo.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by boat.

S.FORM: numa wa barimbin milhungqu ihu ya mutaun?
noma wa barimbin milhongqo iho ya motaon?
milhungqu iaku sa mabiskaw a barimbin ya mutaun.
milhongqo iako sa mabiskaw a barimbin ya motaon.
numa s barimbin milhungqu Shuni ya mutusi lhupilhupishan a taun?
noma s barimbin milhongqo Shoni ya motosi lhopilhopishan a taon?
S.TRANSL: How does Shuni go to school?

S.FORM: Shuni milhungqu sa apuy a barimbin ya mutusi lhupilhupishan a taun.
Shoni milhongqo sa apoy a barimbin ya motosi lhopilhopishan a taon.
S.TRANSL: Shuni goes to school by train.

S.FORM: numa s barimbin milhungqu Hudun ya mutusi balinuqaz a taun?
noma s barimbin milhongqo Hodon ya motosi balinoqaz a taon?
S.TRANSL: How does Hudun go to church?

S.FORM: kmangktha Hudun kangqthaan a barimbin ya mutusi balinuqaz a taun.
kmangktha Hodon kangqthaan a barimbin ya motosi balinoqaz a taon.
S.TRANSL: Hudun goes to church by bicycle.

S.FORM: milhungqu ihu sa mabiskaw a barimbin ya mutusi malhupish?
milhongqo iho sa mabiskaw a barimbin ya motosi malhopish?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by MRT?

S.FORM: ani, milhungqu iaku sa ba-su a barimbin ya mutusi malhupish.
ani, milhongqo iako sa ba-so a barimbin ya motosi malhopish.
S.TRANSL: No, I go to school by bus.

S.FORM: kmangqtha ihu kangqthaan a barimbin ya musui malhupish?
kmangqtha iho kangqthaan a barimbin ya mosoi malhopish?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by bicycle?

S.FORM: ua, kmangqtha iaku sa kangqthaan a barimbin ya musui malhupish.
oa, kmangqtha iako sa kangqthaan a barimbin ya mosoi malhopish.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to school by bicycle.

S.FORM: milhungqu ihu sa lamabiskaw maquliush a barimbin ya mutusi Kau-shiung?
milhongqo iho sa lamabiskaw maqoliosh a barimbin ya motosi Kao-shiong?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail?

S.FORM: ua, milhungqu iaku sa lamabiskaw maquliush a barimbin ya mutusi Kau-shiung.
oa, milhongqo iako sa lamabiskaw maqoliosh a barimbin ya motosi Kao-shiong.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail.

S.FORM: ihu ya mutusi Tai-taang milhungqu sa apuy a barimbin numa ya marfarfaz a barimbin?
iho ya motosi Tai-taang milhongqo sa apoy a barimbin noma ya marfarfaz a barimbin?
S.TRANSL: 你去台東搭火車還是搭飛機?
Are you going to Taitung by train or by plane?

S.FORM: milhungqu iaku sa marfarfaz a barimbin, maqa milhungqu marfarfaz a barimbin mabiskaw mat apuy a barimbin.
milhongqo iako sa marfarfaz a barimbin, maqa milhongqo marfarfaz a barimbin mabiskaw mat apoy a barimbin.
S.TRANSL: 我搭飛機，搭飛機比搭火車快。
I will take the plane because it is faster than the train.

S.FORM: ihu ya mutusi balinuqaz a taun milhungqu sa basu a barimbin numa ya patungbarimbin?
iho ya motosi balinoqaz a taon milhongqo sa baso a barimbin noma ya patongbarimbin?
S.TRANSL: 你去教會搭公車還是開車?
Are you going to drive to the church or take the bus?

S.FORM: patungbarimbin iaku ya mutusi balinuqaz a taun, maqa patungbarimbin maqitan ya mat milhungqu sa basu a barimbin.
patongbarimbin iako ya motosi balinoqaz a taon, maqa patongbarimbin maqitan ya mat milhongqo sa baso a barimbin.
S.TRANSL: 我開車去教會，開車比搭公車方便。
I will drive to the church because it is more convenient than the bus.

S.FORM: farifariwan makitqualh sa mihu a taun qa?
farifariwan makitqoalh sa miho a taon qa?
S.TRANSL: Is the market close to your house?

S.FORM: antu iqualh, matung'u-tu-bai iaku ya mutantu farifariwan.
anto iqoalh, matong'o-to-bai iako ya motanto farifariwan.
S.TRANSL: 不近，我都騎摩托車去超市。
No, it is not, so I always ride the motorcycle to the market.

S.FORM: yu-kiuq makitqualh sa lhupilhupishan a taun qa?
yo-kioq makitqoalh sa lhopilhopishan a taon qa?
S.TRANSL: Is the post office close to the school?

S.FORM: iqualh, ya mundadaan ashaunatantuiza.
iqoalh, ya mondadaan ashaonatantoiza.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it is within walking distance.

S.FORM: kmaan afu a taun makitqualh sa ia'ianan milhungqu a barimbin a taun qa?
kmaan afo a taon makitqoalh sa ia'ianan milhongqo a barimbin a taon qa?
S.TRANSL: Is the restaurant close to the station?

S.FORM: ya mu'apaw sa ia'ianan milhungqu a barimbin a taun uqthawan mundadaan larima wa qumbu ashaunatantuiza.
ya mo'apaw sa ia'ianan milhongqo a barimbin a taon oqthawan mondadaan larima wa qombo ashaonatantoiza.
S.TRANSL: 出車站再走五分鐘就到了。
It only takes five minutes after you walk out of the station.

S.FORM: ishawanan uhu thuini?
ishawanan oho thoini?
minu qa?
mino qa?
amusui iaku mriqaz ihun.
amosoi iako mriqaz ihon.
S.TRANSL: I would like to visit you.

S.FORM: thuini iaku uka shawan numawan uka itaun. suma wa qali shduuiza.
thoini iako oka shawan nomawan oka itaon. soma wa qali shdooiza.
S.TRANSL: 我今天有事不在家。改天吧。
I am out today. How about another day?

S.FORM: ishawanan uhu ya simaq? amakilhim iaku ihun ya saqaziza.
ishawanan oho ya simaq? amakilhim iako ihon ya saqaziza.
S.TRANSL: 那你明天有空嗎?我下午去找你。
Then, are you available tomorrow? I’ll visit you tomorrow afternoon.

S.FORM: shduu, itaun iaku mitalha ihun.
shdoo, itaon iako mitalha ihon.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I will wait for you at home.

S.FORM: makikalhiwan qazii ya shduu aru-iin iaku ihun? maqa amatqal iaku.
makikalhiwan qazii ya shdoo aro-iin iako ihon? maqa amatqal iako.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄音嗎?我想做紀錄。
Would you mind if I do the voice recording? I would like to keep a record.

S.FORM: ua! pusa anunin.
oa! posa anonin.
shduu ya pulaunin sa bahi?
shdoo ya polaonin sa bahi?
S.TRANSL: Would you mind if I do the video recording?

S.FORM: ani iaku tu min'miaqitan ya riqazan, numa talhuqan mani antu pinaqitan, ani.
ani iako to min'miaqitan ya riqazan, noma talhoqan mani anto pinaqitan, ani.
S.TRANSL: 我不好看，倉庫也沒整理，不要啦。
No, I am plain and the warehouse hasn’t been tidied up yet.

S.FORM: muqayiza iaku pashtiruq.
moqayiza iako pashtiroq.
S.TRANSL: Then I will just take photos.

S.FORM: ata mani tu pashtiruq.
ata mani to pashtiroq.
anuniza ihun pakikalhiak.
anoniza ihon pakikalhiak.
S.TRANSL: Thank you for accepting the interview.

S.FORM: anunin qa, numa sa amakikalhiwan uhu?
anonin qa, noma sa amakikalhiwan oho?
S.TRANSL: You are welcome. What would you like to know?

S.FORM: makikalhiwan iaku ihun ya parhawayuan numa sa kalawan uhu?
makikalhiwan iako ihon ya parhawayoan noma sa kalawan oho?
S.TRANSL: 請問您年輕時是做什麼的?
What do you do when you are young?

S.FORM: kahiwan iaku minmaranash, numa iaku pangqaiza thuini.
kahiwan iako minmaranash, noma iako pangqaiza thoini.
S.TRANSL: 我以前是警察，但我現在退休了。
I was a police officer but I am retired now.

S.FORM: itia sa palhkakrikriw ihu thuini?
itia sa palhkakrikriw iho thoini?
S.TRANSL: Then, are you working at the moment?

S.FORM: itusi iaku lhupilhupishan a taun malhkakrikriw.
itosi iako lhopilhopishan a taon malhkakrikriw.
makikalhiwan iaku ihun mihu a azazak itusi kataunan mani qa?
makikalhiwan iako ihon miho a azazak itosi kataonan mani qa?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的孩子也住在部落嗎?
Do your kids live in the tribe too?

S.FORM: uka, naak a azazak itusi mawalhnaq a pruq.
oka, naak a azazak itosi mawalhnaq a proq.
S.TRANSL: 不，我的孩子在都市居住。
No, my kids are all living in the city.

S.FORM: kamamuri ihu lhkananai?
kamamori iho lhkananai?
S.TRANSL: Then, do you live by yourself?

S.FORM: hmadana iaku itiawan latata wa atu numa latata wa rumfaz, thaithuy mani sa naak a taun a thau.
hmadana iako itiawan latata wa ato noma latata wa romfaz, thaithoy mani sa naak a taon a thao.
S.TRANSL: 我還有養一隻狗和一隻鳥，他們也是我的家人。
I also keep a dog and a bird. They are my family.

S.FORM: hmadana iaku latata wa qaruta mani, ianan sa lhkaribush miasuun amaqa antu inawawaaz.
hmadana iako latata wa qarota mani, ianan sa lhkaribosh miasoon amaqa anto inawawaaz.
S.TRANSL: 我也有養一隻貓，有動物陪伴不會無聊。
I have a cat too. I won’t get bored with the company of my pet.

S.FORM: makikalhiwan iaku ihun numanuma wa muribush a parshian.
makikalhiwan iako ihon nomanoma wa moribosh a parshian.
S.TRANSL: 我想請問你關於打獵的禁忌。
I would like to ask you about the taboos of hunting.

S.FORM: daza iaku mafazaq, ya mafazaq iaku afuilh ihun.
daza iako mafazaq, ya mafazaq iako afoilh ihon.
S.TRANSL: 我知道的不多，但我能回答的都會回答你。
I don’t know much about that, but I will tell you everything I know.

S.FORM: numa wa parshian maniun ya muribush a aniamin?
noma wa parshian manion ya moribosh a aniamin?
S.TRANSL: 你們打獵的武器有什麼禁忌嗎?
Do you have any taboos about hunting weapons?

S.FORM: naam a muribush a aniamin antu shduu pashuzap sa binanau'az.
naam a moribosh a aniamin anto shdoo pashozap sa binanao'az.
S.TRANSL: 我們打獵的武器不可以讓女生碰到。
Our hunting weapons are untouchable to women.

S.FORM: shduu binanau'az musuun mutusi muribush?
shdoo binanao'az mosoon motosi moribosh?
S.TRANSL: 那女人可以一起去打獵嗎?
Then, can women go hunting together?

S.FORM: ani, antu binanau'az mani ya muntal muribush.
ani, anto binanao'az mani ya montal moribosh.
S.TRANSL: 不行，女人也不可以打獵。
No, women cannot go hunting either.

S.FORM: Qabus, ukaiza itaun zashuq a qilha, ushaiza ihu fariw.
Qabos, okaiza itaon zashoq a qilha, oshaiza iho fariw.
S.TRANSL: Qabus，家裡沒有米酒了，你去買米酒。
Qabus, our home is out of rice wine, please go and buy some.

S.FORM: sua-kaa itiawan tata pan, ingqaiza tu afariw.
soa-kaa itiawan tata pan, ingqaiza to afariw.
S.TRANSL: 廚房裡還有一瓶，不用買吧。
There is still one bottle left in the kitchen, so there is no need to buy one!

S.FORM: antu shduu tata pan, uqthawan fariw tusha pan.
anto shdoo tata pan, oqthawan fariw tosha pan.
S.TRANSL: 一瓶不夠，再去買兩瓶回來。
One bottle is not enough for me, go and buy two more back.

S.FORM: afariw iaku zashuq a qilha, itia maniun ya fariwin?
afariw iako zashoq a qilha, itia manion ya fariwin?
S.TRANSL: 我要買米酒，你們有賣嗎?
I am looking for rice wine. Do you have any rice wine?

S.FORM: itia! lapiza wa afariwin uhu?
itia! lapiza wa afariwin oho?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How many bottles do you need?

S.FORM: afariw iaku tusha pan, numa afariw tata pinutiqu a zashuq.
afariw iako tosha pan, noma afariw tata pinotiqo a zashoq.
S.TRANSL: 我要買兩瓶，還要買一包米。
I want two bottles and a pack of rice.

S.FORM: zashuq inai, numa sa uqthawan afariwin uhu?
zashoq inai, noma sa oqthawan afariwin oho?
S.TRANSL: 米在這裡，你還需要什麼嗎?
Here is the rice, what else do you need?

S.FORM: amuqthawan fariw iaku qarithuy, itia maniun qa?
amoqthawan fariw iako qarithoy, itia manion qa?
S.TRANSL: I want some eggs too, do you have some?

S.FORM: naam a qarithuy ulhthkizin suma wa finariw.
naam a qarithoy olhthkizin soma wa finariw.
afariw iaku sa hulus.
afariw iako sa holos.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: amiakuza s hulus ushnawin uhu?
amiakoza s holos oshnawin oho?
S.TRANSL: What kind of clothes do you like?

S.FORM: afariw iaku luish a rima wa hulus.
afariw iako loish a rima wa holos.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy the clothes with short sleeves.

S.FORM: qazii ya miakuza s izai maqulhaqulha?
qazii ya miakoza s izai maqolhaqolha?
qazii ya itiawan suma wa kinasia?
qazii ya itiawan soma wa kinasia?
iamin itiawan sa mapuzipuzi numa madishlum.
iamin itiawan sa mapozipozi noma madishlom.
S.TRANSL: We have white and blue ones too.

S.FORM: ananaiwan iakin tata wa madishlum a hulus.
ananaiwan iakin tata wa madishlom a holos.
S.TRANSL: 請給我一件藍色的衣服。
Please give me the clothes in blue.

S.FORM: Qabus shintua ihu tu ikahi? shitusi ihu pinkazakaza sa buut?
Qabos shintoa iho to ikahi? shitosi iho pinkazakaza sa boot?
S.TRANSL: Qabus你剛剛去哪裡了?你去運動嗎?
Qabus, where have you been just now? Did you go exercising?

S.FORM: ani, shitusi iaku mindahip apuki'ay fariwin sa shanglaw.
ani, shitosi iako mindahip apoki'ay fariwin sa shanglaw.
S.TRANSL: No, I went grocery shopping for my grandma.

S.FORM: ihu ya ishawanan ya mahumhum? qazii ya mat iakin kmaan afu.
iho ya ishawanan ya mahomhom? qazii ya mat iakin kmaan afo.
S.TRANSL: 你晚上有沒有空?要不要和我一起吃飯。
No wonder! Are you available at night? Would you like to have a meal with me?

S.FORM: ani, amutusiwak fariw sa hulus.
ani, amotosiwak fariw sa holos.
S.TRANSL: No, I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: muntal iaku ihun.
montal iako ihon.
S.TRANSL: Then, I will go with you.

S.FORM: maqitan ihu, lakuza wa tuali haya wa finutulh a shanglaw.
maqitan iho, lakoza wa toali haya wa finotolh a shanglaw.
S.TRANSL: 你好，請問這把菜多少錢?
Hello, how much is this bunch of vegetables?

S.FORM: tata wa finutulh a shanglaw mapushaz sui.
tata wa finotolh a shanglaw maposhaz soi.
S.TRANSL: The vegetables are $20 for a bunch.

S.FORM: lakuza wa tuali haya wa buna?
lakoza wa toali haya wa bona?
S.TRANSL: How much are these sweet potatoes?

S.FORM: tata tingting a buna maturuz sui.
tata tingting a bona matoroz soi.
S.TRANSL: Sweet potatoes are thirty dollars for a pound.

S.FORM: ananaiwan iakin tusha finutulh a shanglaw numa tata tingting a buna.
ananaiwan iakin tosha finotolh a shanglaw noma tata tingting a bona.
S.TRANSL: 請給我兩把菜和一斤地瓜。
Please give me two bunches of vegetables and a pound of sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: Tuba, min'aura iaku kminathu sa patatash, shduu ihu shimulikuan?
Toba, min'aora iako kminatho sa patatash, shdoo iho shimolikoan?
S.TRANSL: Tuba，我忘了帶筆，你可以借我嗎?
Tuba, I forgot to bring my pen. Can you lend me one?

S.FORM: uka iaku mani, ti Shuni izai.
oka iako mani, ti Shoni izai.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have one either. This is Shuni’s.

S.FORM: shduu ya shimulikuan? muhiaw iaku pushuqishin uhu.
shdoo ya shimolikoan? mohiaw iako poshoqishin oho.
S.TRANSL: 那可以借我一下子嗎?我很快就還你。
Can you lend me the pen for a second? I will return to you immediately.

S.FORM: ua, arahu.
oa, araho.
anuniza, anuniza Shuni mani.
anoniza, anoniza Shoni mani.
S.TRANSL: Thank you and thank Shuni for me.

S.FORM: numa sa amindahipuan uhu?
noma sa amindahipoan oho?
apushuqishin iaku sa izai a latusha wa patashan.
aposhoqishin iako sa izai a latosha wa patashan.
S.TRANSL: I want to return these two books.

S.FORM: ua, itiawan amindahipuan uhu?
oa, itiawan amindahipoan oho?
S.TRANSL: No problem and what else do you need?

S.FORM: amuqthawan iaku shmimul laturu a patashan.
amoqthawan iako shmimol latoro a patashan.
S.TRANSL: I would like to borrow these three books.

S.FORM: shduuiza, ata tu in'auraan ya turuiza wa qali apushuqishin.
shdooiza, ata to in'aoraan ya toroiza wa qali aposhoqishin.
S.TRANSL: 好了，記得三天後要拿來還。
Sure and remember to return them after three days.

S.FORM: niwan ihu tu pushuqishin iakin tatitish.
niwan iho to poshoqishin iakin tatitish.
S.TRANSL: You haven’t returned me the eraser.

S.FORM: pinushuqishiza iaku ihun tilha.
pinoshoqishiza iako ihon tilha.
minuiza naak a tatitish makauka.
minoiza naak a tatitish makaoka.
S.TRANSL: 那我的橡皮擦怎麼不見了。
Then, why is my eraser missing?

S.FORM: qazii ihu ya pashimul Tuba?
qazii iho ya pashimol Toba?
S.TRANSL: Did you lend it to Tuba?

S.FORM: tihawta iaku, pakikalhiwan iaku thithu.
tihawta iako, pakikalhiwan iako thitho.
S.TRANSL: I don’t know. I will go and ask her.

S.FORM: mihala iaku shimulin naak a tatitish ihun.
mihala iako shimolin naak a tatitish ihon.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser first.

S.FORM: Shuni, izai a maka'apaw a hulus sa Tuba wa shimulin uhu?
Shoni, izai a maka'apaw a holos sa Toba wa shimolin oho?
S.TRANSL: Shuni, did Tuba lend you this coat?

S.FORM: ani, haya naak a ina finariw lhai iakin.
ani, haya naak a ina finariw lhai iakin.
S.TRANSL: 不是，這是我媽媽買給我的。
No, my mom bought it for me.

S.FORM: Tuba wa maka'apaw a hulus tataal mihu.
Toba wa maka'apaw a holos tataal miho.
S.TRANSL: Tuba’s coat is the same as yours.

S.FORM: thithu a maka'apaw a hulus maqusuqusum, antu tataal iamin.
thitho a maka'apaw a holos maqosoqosom, anto tataal iamin.
S.TRANSL: 他的外套是黑色的，我們顏色不一樣。
’s coat is thHis coat is black, so our colors are different.e same as yours.

S.FORM: Shuni, shinimul ihu sa Hudun a tuali?
Shoni, shinimol iho sa Hodon a toali?
S.TRANSL: Shuni, did you borrow money from Hudun?

S.FORM: ua, naur thuini iaku mriri thithu, min'aura iaku makathu sa tuali.
oa, naor thoini iako mriri thitho, min'aora iako makatho sa toali.
S.TRANSL: 有，我本來今天要還他，我忘記帶錢了。
Yes, I was supposed to return to him today, but I forgot to bring the money.

S.FORM: alhakaiza ya pushuqishin uhu?
alhakaiza ya poshoqishin oho?
S.TRANSL: Then, when will you return the money?

S.FORM: pushuqishin iaku thithu ya simaq.
poshoqishin iako thitho ya simaq.
S.TRANSL: I will return to him tomorrow.

S.FORM: ua, afuilh iaku Hudun.
oa, afoilh iako Hodon.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I will tell Hudun for you.

S.FORM: ya smapuk sa mashmash apasain sa qadup, numa ya smapuk sa tikulhath apasain sa mahaqu, ya miazithu mubalabalay.
ya smapok sa mashmash apasain sa qadop, noma ya smapok sa tikolhath apasain sa mahaqo, ya miazitho mobalabalay.
S.TRANSL: 老鼠應該要⽤⽯壓式陷阱抓，⽵雞應該要⽤套頸式陷阱抓，這樣才對。
It is correct to catch mice through rangay and catch bamboo partridges through qjiulang.

S.FORM: naur ya miazithu, muririw tu suma iaku, amaqa iaku antu mara.
naor ya miazitho, moririw to soma iako, amaqa iako anto mara.
S.TRANSL: 原來是這樣，我都搞錯了！難怪我都抓不到。
No wonder! I am mistaken and that’s why I cannot catch any of them.

S.FORM: pinfazaq iaku ihun amiakuza kmalawa s izai latusha wa tuqris.
pinfazaq iako ihon amiakoza kmalawa s izai latosha wa toqris.
S.TRANSL: 那我再教你怎麼製作這兩種陷阱。
Then I will teach you how to set up these two traps.

S.FORM: ua! maqitan, ya miazithu shduu iaku mara sa lhkaribush ya kahiza.
oa! maqitan, ya miazitho shdoo iako mara sa lhkaribosh ya kahiza.
S.TRANSL: 好啊！太棒了！這樣我以後就會抓到獵物了。
Great! I will be able to catch the prey in the future.

S.FORM: buhat a lhmir mathuaw marutawiza, usuiwan uhu thapa mara sa kaklhit, amutusi ita buhat.
bohat a lhmir mathoaw marotawiza, osoiwan oho thapa mara sa kaklhit, amotosi ita bohat.
S.TRANSL: 田裡的草太長了，你去倉庫拿鐮刀，我們去田裡。
The grass in the fields is too tall. Go to the warehouse to take the sickle and let’s go to the fields.

S.FORM: pintuan sa kaklhit?
pintoan sa kaklhit?
isai lhalhahi a shirshir, makuntantu ihu thapa ashaqtuniza.
isai lhalhahi a shirshir, makontanto iho thapa ashaqtoniza.
S.TRANSL: 在背簍的旁邊，你進去倉庫就會看到了。
Beside the back basket, you will see it when you enter the warehouse.

S.FORM: inanuru ya mara ata tu klhitin, mathuaw kaklhit malamlam.
inanoro ya mara ata to klhitin, mathoaw kaklhit malamlam.
S.TRANSL: 小心拿不要割到，鐮刀很利。
Be careful and don’t get hurt. The sickle is very sharp.

S.FORM: ata tu kangqthaan naak a tuqris.
ata to kangqthaan naak a toqris.
intua s mihu a tuqris?
intoa s miho a toqris?
naak a tuqris isai huya wa ribush a bangqir.
naak a toqris isai hoya wa ribosh a bangqir.
S.TRANSL: 我的陷阱在那棵樹的下面。
My trap is under that tree.

S.FORM: minu ihu qa mangqtuqtu?
mino iho qa mangqtoqto?
pinataqal iaku izai, mafazaq iaku naak a tuqris ya intua.
pinataqal iako izai, mafazaq iako naak a toqris ya intoa.
S.TRANSL: 我在這邊有做記號，我知道我的陷阱在哪裡。
I make a mark here, so I know where my trap is.

S.FORM: haya wa lhalhuzu, pulhalhuzu iamin falhaza wa shirshir smapuk sa rusaw.
haya wa lhalhozo, polhalhozo iamin falhaza wa shirshir smapok sa rosaw.
S.TRANSL: 這是魚筌，我們放在溪邊捕魚。
This is a fish trap which we put beside the river for fishing.

S.FORM: uka iamin lhalhuzu, pasain iamin paniza ya maniza sa rusaw.
oka iamin lhalhozo, pasain iamin paniza ya maniza sa rosaw.
S.TRANSL: 我們那邊沒有魚筌，我們都用釣竿抓魚。
We don’t have any fish traps there, so we catch fish with a fishing rod.

S.FORM: iaku antu pinasa paniza, shduu ihu suma wa qali pinfazaq iakin?
iako anto pinasa paniza, shdoo iho soma wa qali pinfazaq iakin?
S.TRANSL: 我沒有用過釣竿，你改天教我好嗎?
I have never used a fishing rod before, would you mind teaching me next time?

S.FORM: ua! suma wa qali apalhintaz ita musui maniza sa rusaw.
oa! soma wa qali apalhintaz ita mosoi maniza sa rosaw.
S.TRANSL: 好啊!我們改天一起去釣魚。
Sure! Let’s go fishing together next time.

S.FORM: ya suma wa qali apinfazaq iaku ihun kmalawa sa lhalhuzu.
ya soma wa qali apinfazaq iako ihon kmalawa sa lhalhozo.
S.TRANSL: I will teach you how to make a fish trap next time.

S.FORM: makakakri mihu a paniza, qazii ya mupaniza sa rusaw, iahiaw shmuruz ihu.
makakakri miho a paniza, qazii ya mopaniza sa rosaw, iahiaw shmoroz iho.
S.TRANSL: 你的釣竿動了，是不是有魚上鉤了!你快拉起來。
Your fishing rod is moving. Isn’t the fish on the hook? Pull it up!

S.FORM: italhawan, ma'a'a'inur sa ruza, inai iaku shmuruz sa paniza, utusiwan uhu mara sa dawaz.
italhawan, ma'a'a'inor sa roza, inai iako shmoroz sa paniza, otosiwan oho mara sa dawaz.
S.TRANSL: 等等，船太晃了。我在這邊拉釣竿，你去那邊幫我拿網子來。
Wait, the ship is rolling heavily. I am here to pull the fishing rod and you should go there to grab me the net.

S.FORM: shuruz ihu sa rusaw pakunanai, shuruzikuan sa rusaw.
shoroz iho sa rosaw pakonanai, shorozikoan sa rosaw.
S.TRANSL: 你把魚拉到我這邊，我幫妳拉起來。
Pull the fish to my side and I will help you pull it up.

S.FORM: mathuaw maqitan! u'araan manasha sa rusaw thuini, mathuaw mapunishiza luluman sa rusaw.
mathoaw maqitan! o'araan manasha sa rosaw thoini, mathoaw maponishiza loloman sa rosaw.
S.TRANSL: 太好了!今天大豐收，魚簍都裝滿了。
Great! It is a bumper crop today with full fish baskets.

S.FORM: iahiaw mutaun ita mashtay kungqruman.
iahiaw motaon ita mashtay kongqroman.
S.TRANSL: 我們快回去和大家分享。
Let’s go back immediately and share it with everyone.

S.FORM: itiza fuifuilh patashan a shinshii munai.
itiza foifoilh patashan a shinshii monai.
ingqaiza malhalhiqash, iahiaw ushai mihu a pangka milhungqu.
ingqaiza malhalhiqash, iahiaw oshai miho a pangka milhongqo.
S.TRANSL: 不要再玩了，快坐在座位上。
Stop playing and quickly sit in your seat.

S.FORM: amazaiza, saqazian iaku munai!
amazaiza, saqazian iako monai!
iahiaw mutaun.
iahiaw motaon.
ripay piza thuini?
ripay piza thoini?
ripay rima thuini, pangqaiza simaq, musuun ita kilhnaqualh!
ripay rima thoini, pangqaiza simaq, mosoon ita kilhnaqoalh!
S.TRANSL: 今天星期五，明天放假，一起出去玩吧!
It’s Friday today, we have a day off tomorrow. Let’s go out and play together!

S.FORM: ua! musuun ita mutusi falhaza.
oa! mosoon ita motosi falhaza.
S.TRANSL: Great! Let’s go to the riverside.

S.FORM: ripay piza simaq?
ripay piza simaq?
S.TRANSL: What day will it be tomorrow?

S.FORM: ripay turu simaq, musuun ita matinhina sa maqarimusuz ya simaq saqazi!
ripay toro simaq, mosoon ita matinhina sa maqarimosoz ya simaq saqazi!
S.TRANSL: 明天星期三，我們明天下午去玩球吧!
Tomorrow will be Wednesday. Let’s go play ball tomorrow afternoon!

S.FORM: numa s kalawan uhu simaq a shashanu?
noma s kalawan oho simaq a shashano?
S.TRANSL: What will you be doing tomorrow morning?

S.FORM: amuntal iaku naak a ina, mutusi balinuqaz a taun.
amontal iako naak a ina, motosi balinoqaz a taon.
S.TRANSL: 明天是星期日，我要和媽媽去教會。
Tomorrow will be Sunday, I will be going to church with my mom.

S.FORM: minu ihu qa?
mino iho qa?
miku'utaq iaku, amutusi iaku puthaqian.
miko'otaq iako, amotosi iako pothaqian.
S.TRANSL: I feel like vomiting. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: minqaqarimuzmuz naak a punuq.
minqaqarimozmoz naak a ponoq.
pangqawan uhu isaiwan pangka matikmuthmuth.
pangqawan oho isaiwan pangka matikmothmoth.
shinshii, makashpar naak a tiaz, amutusiwak puthaqian.
shinshii, makashpar naak a tiaz, amotosiwak pothaqian.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我肚子痛，要去廁所。
Teacher, I have a stomachache. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: ua, iahiaw mutantu.
oa, iahiaw motanto.
qazii iaku musui mashinaw rima qa?
qazii iako mosoi mashinaw rima qa?
S.TRANSL: May I go wash my hands?

S.FORM: apangqaiza, shana ikahi mutantu.
apangqaiza, shana ikahi motanto.
S.TRANSL: It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: shinshii, mathuaw makashpar naak a punuq, apangqawak ya saqazi.
shinshii, mathoaw makashpar naak a ponoq, apangqawak ya saqazi.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我頭好痛，下午要請假。
It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: ua, ata iaramaz ya mutaun.
oa, ata iaramaz ya motaon.
S.TRANSL: Okay, take care and go home.

S.FORM: shinshii, apangqawak ya ripay tata, maqa amariqaz iaku mriqariqaz shiz a shinshii.
shinshii, apangqawak ya ripay tata, maqa amariqaz iako mriqariqaz shiz a shinshii.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我下禮拜一要請假，我要去看醫生。
Teacher, I need to take a sick leave next Monday. I have to see a doctor.

S.FORM: ua, piakakalinkin s mihu a buut.
oa, piakakalinkin s miho a boot.
intua sa Apin?
intoa sa Apin?
makashpar thithu tiaz, itusi thithu sa puthaqian.
makashpar thitho tiaz, itosi thitho sa pothaqian.
S.TRANSL: She has a stomachache. She’s in the restroom.

S.FORM: intua sa Shuhut?
intoa sa Shohot?
shinshii, makashpar Shuhut a lahulahu, pangqa thuini.
shinshii, makashpar Shohot a laholaho, pangqa thoini.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, Shuhut has a sore throat. She took a sick leave today.

S.FORM: minu qa Apin uka munai?
mino qa Apin oka monai?
matata dai thithu a buut.
matata dai thitho a boot.
in'ananak uhu mzai mihu a numanuma.
in'ananak oho mzai miho a nomanoma.
naak a lhanaz zain Qaba Lhkapamumu, iaku thuini makthin a qamishan.
naak a lhanaz zain Qaba Lhkapamomo, iako thoini makthin a qamishan.
S.TRANSL: My name is Qaba Lhkapamumu, and I’m 10 years old.

S.FORM: kuzan mihu a lhanaz?
kozan miho a lhanaz?
naak a lhanaz zain Qaba Lhkapamumu.
naak a lhanaz zain Qaba Lhkapamomo.
lhkanantua wa azazak ihu?
lhkanantoa wa azazak iho?
S.TRANSL: What ethnic group are you from?

S.FORM: tu Thau a azazak iaku.
to Thao a azazak iako.
mihu a taun az'az miniahala inai a thau qa?
miho a taon az'az miniahala inai a thao qa?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: ua, iamin tata taun az'az Thau.
oa, iamin tata taon az'az Thao.
S.TRANSL: 是的，我們全家都是邵族人。
Yes, my whole family is Thau.

S.FORM: mihu a taun az'az miniahala inai a thau qa?
miho a taon az'az miniahala inai a thao qa?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: ani, tu Thau naak a ama, numa Shpuut naak a ina.
ani, to Thao naak a ama, noma Shpoot naak a ina.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我的爸爸是邵族，我的媽媽是漢人。
No, my father is Thau, and my mother is Han Taiwanese.

S.FORM: manu a azazak ihu?
mano a azazak iho?
Paruqatash Lhkapamumu a azazak iaku.
Paroqatash Lhkapamomo a azazak iako.
huya mihu a ama qa? pizaiza thithu a qamishan?
hoya miho a ama qa? pizaiza thitho a qamishan?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: makalhturuturuiza makthin thithu a qamishan.
makalhtorotoroiza makthin thitho a qamishan.
huya mihu a ama qa? pizaiza thithu a qamishan?
hoya miho a ama qa? pizaiza thitho a qamishan?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: ani, naam a kataunan a tanatuqash, makashpashpatiza makthin thithu a qamishan.
ani, naam a kataonan a tanatoqash, makashpashpatiza makthin thitho a qamishan.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我們部落的耆老，他80歲了。
No, he is an elder of our tribe. He is 80 years old.

S.FORM: pizaiza s mihu a tantuqash ayuzi a minlhafut a qamishan?
pizaiza s miho a tantoqash ayozi a minlhafot a qamishan?
makthin makashpashpat naak a tantuqash ayuzi a minlhafut a qamishan.
makthin makashpashpat naak a tantoqash ayozi a minlhafot a qamishan.
mihu a tantuqash ayuzi a minlhafut manasha qamishan mat ihu qa?
miho a tantoqash ayozi a minlhafot manasha qamishan mat iho qa?
S.TRANSL: 你哥哥年紀比你大很多嗎?
Is your brother much older than you?

S.FORM: shantaan iakin larima wa qamishan.
shantaan iakin larima wa qamishan.
lakuza ihu rutaw?
lakoza iho rotaw?
tata shaba mashpatiz shian a rutaw iaku.
tata shaba mashpatiz shian a rotaw iako.
mindaaq iaku antu mriqaz ihun, minrutawiza ihu qa?
mindaaq iako anto mriqaz ihon, minrotawiza iho qa?
S.TRANSL: 好久不見，你是不是長高了?
I haven’t seen you in a while. Have you grown taller?

S.FORM: ua, tata shaba maturuziza shian a rutaw iaku.
oa, tata shaba matoroziza shian a rotaw iako.
minramuiza ihu qa?
minramoiza iho qa?
ani, muririw ihu mriqaz.
ani, moririw iho mriqaz.
minshiqarmaniza ihu qa?
minshiqarmaniza iho qa?
ani, minramuiza iaku.
ani, minramoiza iako.
minramuiza ihu qa?
minramoiza iho qa?
ua, maturuziza iaku qung tingting thuini.
oa, matoroziza iako qong tingting thoini.
amuntua ihu?
amontoa iho?
amutusi iaku palhkakrikriw a ianan makilhim iaku fuifuilh patashan a shinshii.
amotosi iako palhkakrikriw a ianan makilhim iako foifoilh patashan a shinshii.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to the office to see the teacher.

S.FORM: amuntua Quan?
amontoa Qoan?
amutusi thithu qmauriwa sa bzu.
amotosi thitho qmaoriwa sa bzo.
S.TRANSL: He’s going to throw away the trash.

S.FORM: intua sa Quan?
intoa sa Qoan?
itusi thithu mrauz a pruq, amalantatnur thithu mrauz ya ikahi.
itosi thitho mraoz a proq, amalantatnor thitho mraoz ya ikahi.
S.TRANSL: 他在游泳池，他等一下要比賽游泳。
He’s at the swimming pool. He’s going to compete in a swimming competition later.

S.FORM: intua sa Ilun? amalantatnur thithu malalia ya ikahi.
intoa sa Ilon? amalantatnor thitho malalia ya ikahi.
S.TRANSL: Ilun在哪裡?她等一下要比賽跑步。
Where is Ilun? She’s going to compete in a running competition later.

S.FORM: itusi thithu palhkakrikriw a ianan, amutantu iaku malalawa.
itosi thitho palhkakrikriw a ianan, amotanto iako malalawa.
S.TRANSL: She’s in the auditorium. I’ll go call her.

S.FORM: palhintal ita mutantu makakakri a danshiqan.
palhintal ita motanto makakakri a danshiqan.
S.TRANSL: Let’s go to the playground together.

S.FORM: amihala iaku fariw sa kunsaqazi a akaanin, amutantu iaku makilhim ihu ya ikahi.
amihala iako fariw sa konsaqazi a akaanin, amotanto iako makilhim iho ya ikahi.
S.TRANSL: 我先去買午餐，等一下去找你。
I’ll go buy lunch first, and then I’ll meet you later.

S.FORM: izau usuun ita mungqibi sa pinuqafay!
izao osoon ita mongqibi sa pinoqafay!
S.TRANSL: Let’s carry the lunch boxes together!

S.FORM: kilhimuan uhu suma, amutusi iaku makilhim fuifuilh patashan a shinshii.
kilhimoan oho soma, amotosi iako makilhim foifoilh patashan a shinshii.
S.TRANSL: 你找別人，我要去找老師。
You find someone else, I’m going to find the teacher.

S.FORM: amalantatnur Quan malalia thuini qa?
amalantatnor Qoan malalia thoini qa?
S.TRANSL: Is Quan competing in running today?

S.FORM: ani, amalantatnur thithu minparaw.
ani, amalantatnor thitho minparaw.
S.TRANSL: No, he’s competing in high jump.

S.FORM: amalantatnur ihu numanuma qa ya amalantatnur numanuma wa qali?
amalantatnor iho nomanoma qa ya amalantatnor nomanoma wa qali?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: ua, amalantatnur iaku malalia.
oa, amalantatnor iako malalia.
amalantatnur ihu numanuma qa ya amalantatnur numanuma wa qali?
amalantatnor iho nomanoma qa ya amalantatnor nomanoma wa qali?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: amalantatnur iaku minparaw.
amalantatnor iako minparaw.
numa s kalawan ita ya amalantatnur numanuma wa qali?
noma s kalawan ita ya amalantatnor nomanoma wa qali?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會那天要做甚麼?
What will we do in the sports day?

S.FORM: amalantatnur ita mapashashuruz faa.
amalantatnor ita mapashashoroz faa.
S.TRANSL: We will compete in tug of war.

S.FORM: afariwin suma ita akaanin ya amalantatnur numanuma wa qali qa?
afariwin soma ita akaanin ya amalantatnor nomanoma wa qali qa?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會要賣食物嗎?
Will we sell food at the sports day?

S.FORM: ani, afariwin suma ita marfazfaz a maqarimusuz.
ani, afariwin soma ita marfazfaz a maqarimosoz.
mathuaw ihu matunaw, mathuaw ma'ania!
mathoaw iho matonaw, mathoaw ma'ania!
S.TRANSL: 你獲得了第一名耶，真是厲害！
Congratulations on getting first place! You’re amazing!

S.FORM: anuniza.
anoniza.
itia mihu a apuki'ay itaun?
itia miho a apoki'ay itaon?
itia, isa ianan thithu malhus.
itia, isa ianan thitho malhos.
S.TRANSL: Yes, she’s sleeping in her room.

S.FORM: itia mihu a apuki'ay itaun?
itia miho a apoki'ay itaon?
uka itaun, musaran thithu tu ikahi, amutaun thithu ya tanlhuan.
oka itaon, mosaran thitho to ikahi, amotaon thitho ya tanlhoan.
S.TRANSL: 不在，她剛出去了，要晚上才回家。
No, she’s not. She just went out and will be back in the evening.

S.FORM: itia mihu a apura'in itaun?
itia miho a apora'in itaon?
isui makinpushaz a taun thithu, anasaya ihu makinpushaz a taun kmilhim thithu.
isoi makinposhaz a taon thitho, anasaya iho makinposhaz a taon kmilhim thitho.
S.TRANSL: 他在二樓，你上去找他吧。
He’s upstairs. You can go up and find him.

S.FORM: itia thau itaun?
itia thao itaon?
ba! Malihan, mathuaw mataliza antu mriqaz ihun, maqitan ihu qa?
ba! Malihan, mathoaw mataliza anto mriqaz ihon, maqitan iho qa?
S.TRANSL: 是Malihan阿，很久沒有看到你了，你好嗎?
It’s Malihan. I haven’t seen you in a while! How have you been?

S.FORM: maqitan! amakilhim iaku ihun amalhalhinunawan.
maqitan! amakilhim iako ihon amalhalhinonawan.
S.TRANSL: I’m doing great! I came to chat with you.

S.FORM: intua s mihu a ama?
intoa s miho a ama?
isa ainuz kmal'in thithu sa pania'an, apalalawak.
isa ainoz kmal'in thitho sa pania'an, apalalawak.
S.TRANSL: 他在廚房炒菜，我去叫他。
He’s in the kitchen cooking. Let me go call him.

S.FORM: muntua sa Anai?
montoa sa Anai?
mutusi thithu qalhufu smapuk sa ranaw.
motosi thitho qalhofo smapok sa ranaw.
S.TRANSL: She went to the chicken coop to catch chickens.

S.FORM: apura'in, itiza iamin munai.
apora'in, itiza iamin monai.
uka maniun a apura'in itaun, isai buhat thithu, itaun maniun mitalha thithu.
oka manion a apora'in itaon, isai bohat thitho, itaon manion mitalha thitho.
S.TRANSL: 你們的爺爺不在家，他在田裡，你們在家等他吧。
Your grandfather is not at home. He’s in the field. Wait for him to come back.

S.FORM: ama Tuba itiza ihu munai!
ama Toba itiza iho monai!
mathuaw mataliza antu mriqaz ihun, minmarutawiza ihu.
mathoaw mataliza anto mriqaz ihon, minmarotawiza iho.
S.TRANSL: I haven’t seen you in a while. You’ve grown taller.

S.FORM: mathuaw maqaran naak a shnaw ya mriqaz ihun.
mathoaw maqaran naak a shnaw ya mriqaz ihon.
S.TRANSL: It’s so good to see you.

S.FORM: haya wa ung-lai pansha maniun, apisai matithi a kakadu.
haya wa ong-lai pansha manion, apisai matithi a kakado.
S.TRANSL: 這是給你們的鳳梨，要放到冰箱裡。
Here’s a pineapple for you. Put it in the refrigerator.

S.FORM: mindaaqiza antu shinai, amalalawa iaku thaithuy pashtay mulhthkiz munai makaan.
mindaaqiza anto shinai, amalalawa iako thaithoy pashtay molhthkiz monai makaan.
S.TRANSL: 這麼久沒來，我叫大家一起來吃飯。
It’s been a while. Let’s have a meal together.

S.FORM: ingqaiza uka shawashawan, uqay iaku miqilha pushawil, usui ita maharan a bukhaz malhalhinuna.
ingqaiza oka shawashawan, oqay iako miqilha poshawil, osoi ita maharan a bokhaz malhalhinona.
S.TRANSL: 不用麻煩了，我喝茶就好，我們來客廳聊天。
No need to bother. I’ll just have tea. Let’s sit in the living room and chat.

S.FORM: anuniza! ingqaiza uka shawashawan, amutaun iaku.
anoniza! ingqaiza oka shawashawan, amotaon iako.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝你的招待，我要回去了。
Thank you for your hospitality. I have to go now.

S.FORM: kinapathay iaku haya ranaw, kathuiza ihu manataun makaan.
kinapathay iako haya ranaw, kathoiza iho manataon makaan.
S.TRANSL: 這隻雞剛殺好，你帶回去慢慢吃。
This chicken was just freshly killed. Take it home and enjoy it slowly.

S.FORM: qazii ya simaq a saqazi mapariqaz ita?
qazii ya simaq a saqazi mapariqaz ita?
S.TRANSL: 我和您約明天下午好嗎?
Can I make an appointment with you tomorrow afternoon?

S.FORM: ua, a'intua ita amapariqaz?
oa, a'intoa ita amapariqaz?
isui ita lhupilhupishan a taun mitalha? apashtiruq iamin.
isoi ita lhopilhopishan a taon mitalha? apashtiroq iamin.
S.TRANSL: 我們約學校好嗎?我們要錄影。
How about meeting at school? We need to shoot a video.

S.FORM: usui ita talhuqan mitalha maqitan, a'ifazin Thau a hulus iaku mutantu.
osoi ita talhoqan mitalha maqitan, a'ifazin Thao a holos iako motanto.
S.TRANSL: 那去聚會所好了，我會穿族服去。
Then let’s go to the community center. I’ll wear folk costume.

S.FORM: mathuaw lamaqitan iamin a sa-ku-laa ya makabukay. ya makabukay unai ihu makilhim iakin.
mathoaw lamaqitan iamin a sa-ko-laa ya makabokay. ya makabokay onai iho makilhim iakin.
S.TRANSL: 我們部落的櫻花盛開很漂亮。等花開的時候你來找我吧!
The cherry blossoms in our tribe are beautiful when they bloom. Come find me when the flowers bloom!

S.FORM: ashaunatusiza puhubuqiza wa qali, mathuaw mindaaq!
ashaonatosiza pohoboqiza wa qali, mathoaw mindaaq!
S.TRANSL: 那要等到春天，太晚了吧!
That would have to wait until spring. It’s too late, isn’t it?

S.FORM: qazii ya Tungkariri Lus'an ihu munai!
qazii ya Tongkariri Los'an iho monai!
S.TRANSL: 那你祖靈祭的時候來吧!
Then come during our Tungkariri Lus’an!

S.FORM: ua! miku'utantu iaku!
oa! miko'otanto iako!
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’m looking forward to it!

S.FORM: minu ihu qa amushuqish kataunan?
mino iho qa amoshoqish kataonan?
S.TRANSL: 請問你為甚麼要搬回部落生活?
May I ask why you decided to move back to the tribe?

S.FORM: maqa amutaun iaku fuifuilh patashan.
maqa amotaon iako foifoilh patashan.
S.TRANSL: I want to return to teach at the local school.

S.FORM: minu ihu qa antu itusi mawalhnaq a pruq fuifuilh patashan?
mino iho qa anto itosi mawalhnaq a proq foifoilh patashan?
S.TRANSL: Why not teach in the city?

S.FORM: maqa mangqtu iaku naak a kataunan a pruq, numa miku iaku lhungqizi kataunan a thau.
maqa mangqto iako naak a kataonan a proq, noma miko iako lhongqizi kataonan a thao.
S.TRANSL: 因為我懷念我的故鄉，也希望能回饋部落。
Because I miss my hometown and I also want to give back to the tribe.

S.FORM: mathuaw ma'ania ihu tunuun, tima fuilh ihun?
mathoaw ma'ania iho tonoon, tima foilh ihon?
S.TRANSL: 你很會織布，是誰教你的?
You’re very skilled at weaving, who taught you?

S.FORM: naak a apuki'ay, lamathuaw thithu ma'ania tunuun maqusum a tanatuqash isa naam a kataunan.
naak a apoki'ay, lamathoaw thitho ma'ania tonoon maqosom a tanatoqash isa naam a kataonan.
S.TRANSL: 是我的奶奶，她是我們部落最會織布的人。
It was my grandmother, she is the most skilled weaver in our tribe.

S.FORM: minu ihu qa amangqtu minfazaq tunuun sa maqusum?
mino iho qa amangqto minfazaq tonoon sa maqosom?
S.TRANSL: How did you develop an interest in learning weaving?

S.FORM: maqa tunuun sa maqusum mita wa kazakazash, mangqtu iaku izai a kazakazash ata pu'ukai.
maqa tonoon sa maqosom mita wa kazakazash, mangqto iako izai a kazakazash ata po'okai.
S.TRANSL: 織布是我們的文化，我想要讓文化延續。
Weaving is a part of our culture, and I want to ensure its continuity.

S.FORM: haya sunda wa qilha mathuaw maqitan ya qilhan.
haya sonda wa qilha mathoaw maqitan ya qilhan.
iaku min'ananak pinqilha!
iako min'ananak pinqilha!
mathuaw ma'ania ihu, amindaaq ya kmalawa haya qilha?
mathoaw ma'ania iho, amindaaq ya kmalawa haya qilha?
S.TRANSL: 你真厲害，這要釀很久嗎?
You’re really talented. Does it take a long time to make?

S.FORM: antu mindaaq, tata wa ripay painan aminqilhaiza. pintatan sunda wa zashuq masa kamar, numa pahiburan sa bulbul, numa ribuqin pisai qatapay, numa pusai sa tahamish.
anto mindaaq, tata wa ripay painan aminqilhaiza. pintatan sonda wa zashoq masa kamar, noma pahiboran sa bolbol, noma riboqin pisai qatapay, noma posai sa tahamish.
S.TRANSL: 不用，大約一周就好了。把糯米和小米先蒸熟，再加入麴粉一起拌勻，就可以裝到甕裡了。
No, it only takes about a week. After steaming the sticky rice and white rice, we mix it with yeast powder, and then it can be stored in a jar.

S.FORM: numa s ihu farifariwin aniamin?
noma s iho farifariwin aniamin?
itia haya makamun numa tilkun, iaku min'ananak malhuiza!
itia haya makamon noma tilkon, iako min'ananak malhoiza!
S.TRANSL: 我這裡有辣椒和蕗蕎，都是我自己種的喔!
I have chili and lokiy, both grown by myself!

S.FORM: lakuza wa tuali haya latusha afariwik?
lakoza wa toali haya latosha afariwik?
mulhthkiz lhupishin tusha shaba ianan larima makthin a sui.
molhthkiz lhopishin tosha shaba ianan larima makthin a soi.
mushnaw iaku haya hulus, lapiza wa tuali?
moshnaw iako haya holos, lapiza wa toali?
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡這件衣服，多少錢?
I like this piece of clothing. How much is it?

S.FORM: haya latata larima shaba wa sui.
haya latata larima shaba wa soi.
mathuaw maklis, qazii ya put'ladadu?
mathoaw maklis, qazii ya pot'ladado?
S.TRANSL: It’s too expensive. Can’t you lower the price a bit?

S.FORM: ata, ya ladadu pungqalath iaku sa tuali.
ata, ya ladado pongqalath iako sa toali.
S.TRANSL: No, if I lower it further, I’ll lose money.

S.FORM: shduu! afariw iaku latata maqusuqusum a hulus.
shdoo! afariw iako latata maqosoqosom a holos.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!那我要一件黑色的衣服。
Alright then, I’ll take a black piece of clothing.

S.FORM: afariw iaku haya funush numa qashay.
afariw iako haya fonosh noma qashay.
S.TRANSL: 我要這把刀和這個鍋子。
I want this knife and this pot.

S.FORM: mulhthkiz lhupishin latusha matilatilaw a sui, haya funush numa qashay min'ananak iaku kmalawa, amathuaw mindaaq maqitan kinalawa.
molhthkiz lhopishin latosha matilatilaw a soi, haya fonosh noma qashay min'ananak iako kmalawa, amathoaw mindaaq maqitan kinalawa.
S.TRANSL: 總共2000元，這是我自己手工打造的，保證可以用很久。
It’s a total of 2000 dollars. I handmade these, and they are guaranteed to last a long time.

S.FORM: amalalawa iaku naak a huruy munai fariw, put'ladaduan dai?
amalalawa iako naak a horoy monai fariw, pot'ladadoan dai?
S.TRANSL: 我介紹朋友來買，可以再便宜一些嗎?
I’ll introduce my friend to buy. Can you give a further discount?

S.FORM: shduu! put'ladaduan ladadu.
shdoo! pot'ladadoan ladado.
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’ll give you a discount.

S.FORM: izau unai mariqazuan! farifariw hulus numa tamuhun!
izao onai mariqazoan! farifariw holos noma tamohon!
S.TRANSL: 來看看喔!衣服帽子都有賣。
Come and take a look! We sell clothes and hats.

S.FORM: lapiza wa tuali haya wa hulus?
lapiza wa toali haya wa holos?
haya latata hulus turu shaba ianan marimaz a sui, numa ya laturu shduuiza tata matilatilaw a sui.
haya latata holos toro shaba ianan marimaz a soi, noma ya latoro shdooiza tata matilatilaw a soi.
S.TRANSL: One piece of clothing is 350 dollars, three pieces for 1000 dollars.

S.FORM: amuqay iaku fariw latata, anai faqlhu a hulus
amoqay iako fariw latata, anai faqlho a holos
S.TRANSL: 我買一件就好，請給我新的。
I’ll just buy one piece, please give me a new one.

S.FORM: maqitan ihu, afariw iaku sunda wa afu numa qana.
maqitan iho, afariw iako sonda wa afo noma qana.
S.TRANSL: 你好，我想要買糯米飯和刺蔥芋莖腸。
Hello, I would like to buy sticky rice and braised pork with maqaw pepper.

S.FORM: mulhthkizin fariwiniza s afu ukaiza. itia tatanaq a qmu, afariw ihu?
molhthkizin fariwiniza s afo okaiza. itia tatanaq a qmo, afariw iho?
S.TRANSL: 飯賣完了。我還有刺蔥麻糬，你要買嗎?
The rice is sold out. I have tana mochi, would you like to buy them?

S.FORM: ua! fariw iaku tata, amuqthaiza iaku munai fariw afu.
oa! fariw iako tata, amoqthaiza iako monai fariw afo.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!請給我一份，我下次再來買飯。
Alright, please give me one. I’ll come back next time to buy rice.

S.FORM: ua, apasain qahil iaku putiqu lhai ihun, haya marimaz a sui.
oa, apasain qahil iako potiqo lhai ihon, haya marimaz a soi.
S.TRANSL: W：好，我幫你用袋子裝起來，這樣50元。
Okay, I’ll pack it in a bag for you. That’ll be 50 dollars.
